docs.title: 1. ​没有​固定​形状​的
docs.text: ​例如​液体​（milk）​或​气体​（air）​等​...

docs.title: 2. ​太小​、​由​微小​的​物体​组成​的
docs.text: ​例如​：sand（​沙子​）、grass（​草​）、hair（​头发​）​等​...

docs.title: 3. ​当成​总体​来​称呼​的
docs.text: ​例如​：food（​食物​）、money（​钱​[​指​全部​的​钱​]）

docs.title: 4. ​同一​单词​，​多个​含义​的
docs.text:
*​可以​说​，​这里​已经​不是​初学者​首次​学习​英语​时​需要​先​掌握​的​地方​了​

​有时​同一个​单词​，​其​意思​分为​了​很​多种​，​而​不同​的​意思​也​具有​可数​与​不可数​之分​。

​例子​

Please give me some time.（​请​给​我​一点​时间​）​此处​的​“time”​表​“​时间​”，​因​其​没有​固定​的​量化​单位​，​所以​是​不可数​的​ We have experienced a beautiful time together.（​我们​一起​度过​了​一段​美好​的​时光​）​在​此​语境​中​，“time”​表示​“​时光​”，“​一段​时光​”​所​表示​的​具体​时间​长度​可​有长有短​，​所以​是​可数​的​

​遇到​这种​情况​，​我们​能够​做到​的​最好​方法​便是​勤​查字典​。

docs.title: 二​：​表示​数量​的​一些​短语
docs.text:
1. a piece of（​一块​、​一张​、​一片​）
  2. a loaf of（​一条​）
  3. a bar of（​一块​）
  4. a bottle of（​一瓶​）
  5. a pound of（​一磅​[​英国​与​美国​所​使用​的​英制​质量​单位​]，​一磅​等于​453.59237​克​）
  6. half a pound of（​半磅​，​半磅​等于​226.796185​克​）
  7. a quarter of（​四分之一​[1/4]）
  8. a tin of（​一罐​、​一盒​）
​单词​

/tʃiːz/ cheese n.[C/U]​乳酪​，​奶酪​ /bred/ bread n.[U]​面包​ /səʊp/ soap n.[U]​肥皂​ /ˈtʃɒklət/ chocolate n.[C/U]​巧克力​ /ˈʃʊɡə/ sugar n.[C/U]​糖​ /ˈkɒfi/ coffee n.[C/U]​咖啡​ /tiː/ tea n.[C/U]​茶​ /təˈbækəʊ/ tobacco n.[U]​烟草​，​烟丝​

​语法​练习

docs.title: Lesson 42：Is there a... in/on that...（​在​那个​... ​当中​/​上面​ ​有​一个​...​吗​？）　　　　　   Is there any... in/on that...?（​在​那个​... ​当中​/​上面​ ​有​...?）
docs.text:
​练习​

​可数名词​与​不​可数名词​ 1. milk[U] ①：Is there any milk here?（​这里​有​一些​牛奶​吗​？ | ここにミルクはありますか?） ②：Yes, there is. There's some on the table.（​是​的​，​有​。 ​桌子​上​有​一些​。 | テーブルの​上​にあります。） 2. book[C] ①：Are there any books here?（​这里​有​一些​书​吗​？ | ここに​本​はありますか？） ②：Yes, there are. There are some on the desk.（​是​的​，​有​。 ​书桌上​有​一些​。 | はい、あります。 ​机​の​上​にあります。） 3. bread[U] ①：Is there any bread here?（​这里​有​一些​面包​吗​？ | ここにパンはありますか？） ②：Yes, there is. There's some on the plate.（​是​的​，​有​。​盘子​里​有​一些​。 | はい，あります。お​皿​の​上​にあります。）

​单词​

/bɜːd/ bird n.[C]​鸟​ /ˈeni/ any det.​一些​ /sʌm/ some det.​一些​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​信息​提问​并​回答​问题​ ​例​：There is an orange in that basket.（not banana） - Is there an orange in that basket? - Yes, there is. - Is there a banana in that basket, too? - No, there isn't. There isn't a banana there. ①：There is a map in that book.（not picture） - Is there a map in that book? - Yes, there is. - Is there a picture in that book, too? - No, there isn't. There isn't a picture there. ②：There is a cake on that plate.（not sandwich） - Is there a cake on that plate? - Yes, there is. - Is there a sandwich on that plate, too? - No, there isn't. There isn't a sandwich there. ③：There is an egg in that tin.（not apple） - Is there an egg in that tin? - Yes, there is. - Is there an apple in that tin, too? - No, there isn't. There isn't an apple there. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​信息​提问​并​回答​问题​ ​例​：There is some sugar in that cup.（not tea） - Is there any tea in that cup? - No, there isn't. There is some sugar. ①：There is some milk in that glass.（not water） - Is there any water in that glass? - No, there isn't. There is some milk. ②：There is some tea in that cup.（not coffee） - Is there any coffee in that cup? - No, there isn't There is some tea. ③：There is some ink on that desk.（not paper） - Is there any paper on that desk? - No, there isn't. There is some ink.

docs.title: 一​：​如何​使用​情态​动词​“can（​能​）”？
什么​是​情态​动词​？
docs.text: “​情态​动词​”​是​一种​本身​有​一定​的​词义​的​词汇​，​表示​说话​人​对​有关​行为​或事物​的​态度​、​情感​和​看法​等​。

docs.title: 情态​动词​“can”
docs.text: ​情态​动词​“can”​的​用法​多样​，​通常​被​直译​为​“​能​、​可以​、​会​”。

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“can”​的​肯定句
docs.text:
​结构​：​主语​ + can + do[v.​动词​原型​]

​例子​

1. bird Bird can fly in the sky.（​鸟​可以​在​天空​飞翔​。 | ​鳥​は​空​を​飛​べる。） 2. dog Dog can swim in the river.（​狗​可以​在​河​中游​。 | ​犬​は​川​で​泳​げる。） 3. cat Cat can climb the wall.（​猫​可以​爬墙​。 | ​猫​は​壁​を​登​れる。）

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“can”​的​否定句
docs.text:
​结构​：​主语​ + can + not + do[v.​动词​原型​]

*cannot = can not = can't

​例子​

1. cat Cat can't read a book.（​猫读​不了​书​。 | ​猫​は​本​が​読​めません。） 2. elephant Elephant can't jump.（​大象​不能​跳跃​。 | ​象​はジャンプできません。） 3. pig Pig can't look at the sky.（​猪​看​不了​天空​。 | ​豚​には​空​が​見​えません。）

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“can”​的​一般​疑问句
docs.text:
​结构​：Can + ​主语​ + do[v.​动词​原型​]?

​例子​

1. me Can you help me? -- Yes, I can. / No, I can't.（​你​能​帮帮我​吗​？ -- ​可以​。/ ​不​，​我​不行​。 | ​手​伝​ってもらえませんか？ -- はい、いいです。/ いいえ、できません。） 2. dog Can the dog swim? -- Yes, it can.（​狗​可以​游泳​吗​？ -- ​是​的​，​可以​。 | ​犬​は​泳​げますか？ | はい、​犬​ならできます。） 3. kiwi Can kiwi fly? -- No, it can't.（​鹬鸵​[yu tuo]​可以​飞​吗​？ -- ​不​，​不能​。 | キウイは​飛​べるのか？ -- いいえ、キウイはできません。）

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“can”​的​特殊​疑问句
docs.text:
​结构​：What + can + ​主语​ + do[v.​动词​原型​]?

​例子​

1. bird What can the bird do?（​鸟​可以​做​什么​？ | ​鳥​は​何​ができますか？） -- It can dance.（​它​能​跳舞​。 | ​鳥​は​踊​ることができます。） 2. dog What can the cat do?（​猫​可以​做​什么​？ | ​猫​は​何​ができますか？） -- It can climb a tree.（​它​可以​爬树​。 | ​猫​は​木​に​登​れる。） 3. grasshopper What can the grasshopper do?（​蝗虫​可以​做​什么​？ | イナゴは​何​ができますか？） -- It can jump.（​它​可以​跳​。 | イナゴはジャンプができる。）

​单词​

/əv-'kɔːs/ of course ​当然​ /ˈketl/ kettle n.[C]​水壶​ /bɪˈhaɪnd/ behind prep.​在​...​的​后面​ /ˈtiːpɒt/ teapot n.[C]​茶壶​ /naʊ/ now adv.​现在​ /faɪnd/ find v.​找到​ /bɔɪl/ boil v.​沸腾​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​造句​ ​例​：pens on the table - There are some pens on the table. ink in the bottle - There is some ink in the bottle. ①：pencils on the desk - There are some pencils on the desk. paper on the shelf - There is some paper on the shelf. ②：knives in the box - There are some knives in the box. cheese on the plate - There is some cheese on the plate. ③：books in the bookcase - There are some books in the bookcase. bread on the dishes - There is some bread onn the dishes. ​二​：​仿照​例句​提问​并​回答​ ​例​：magazines on the shelf - Are there any magazines on the shelf? -- No, there aren't any magazines on the shelf. butter on the plate. - Is there any butter on the plate? -- No, there isn't any butter on the plate. ①：birds in the tree - Are there any birds in the tree? -- No, there aren't any birds in the tree. paper on the desk - Are there any paper on the desk? -- No, there isn't any paper on the desk. ②：shoes under the bed - Are there any shoes under the bed? -- No, there aren't any shoes under the bed. clothes on the bed - Is there any clothes on the bed? -- No, there isn't any clothes on the bed. ③：glasses on the table - Are there any glasses on the table? -- No, there aren't any glasses on the table. water in the glass - Is there any water in the glass? -- No, there isn't any water in the glass. ​三​：​仿照​例句​造句​ ​例​：two spoons on the plate - There are two spoons on the plate. two cups of tea on the table - There are two cups of tea on the table. ①：three hundred pages in the book - There are three hundred pages in the book. two pieces of paper on the desk - There are two pieces of paper on the desk. ②：five knives in the cupboard - There are five knives in the cupboard. two loaves of bread in the bag - There are two loaves of bread in the bag. ③：six men in the office - There are six men in the office. twelve bars of chocolate on the table - There are twelve bars of chocolate on the table.

docs.title: Lesson 44：Are there any ...?（​有​...​吗​？）　　　　　   Is there any ...?（​有​...​吗​？）
docs.text:
​练习​

​情态​动词​can + ​可数​/​不​可数名词​ 1. hammers[C] Can you give me those hammers?（​你​能​拿​那些​锤子​给​我​吗​？ | それらのハンマーをくれますか？） -- Yes, I can.（​好​的​，​我​可以​。 | はいよ。） 2. milk[U] Can you give me some milk?（​你​能​给​我​一些​牛奶​吗​？ | ​牛乳​をもらえますか？） -- Yes, I can. Here you are.（​好​的​，​我​可以​。​给​你​... | いいですよ。ほら...） -- Thank you.（​谢谢​。 | ありがとう。） 3. tea[U] Can you give me some tea?（​你​能​给​我​一些​茶​吗​？ | お​茶​をもらえますか？） -- Yes, I can. Here you are.（​好​的​，​我​可以​。​给​你​... | いいですよ。ほら...） -- Thank you.（​谢谢​。 | ありがとう。）

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​编写​对话​ ​例​：you/speak/English/French/German/Sam Can you speak English? - Yes, I am. Can you speak French? - No, I can't, but I can speak German. Who can speak French? - Sam can speak French. ①：Ann/make/tea/bread/coffee/Jonh Can Ann make tea? - Yes, she can. Can she make bread? - No, she can't, but she can make coffee. Who can make bread? - John can make bread. ②：Mike/ride a bike/drive a car/ride a horse/my father Can Mike ride a bike? - Yes, he can. Can he drive a car? - No, he can't, but he can ride a horse. Who can drive a car? - My father can drive a car. ②：they/speak/Dutch/Japanese/Korean/Mary Can they speak Dutch? - Yes, they can. Can they speak Japanese? - No, they can't, but they can speak Korean. Who can speak Japanese? - Mary can speak Japanese. ​二​：​选择​正确​的​介词​填空​ ①：A tall man is sitting in front of（between, in front of） me. ②：The boy is hiding behind（on, behind） a tree. ③：There is a garden between（behind, between） the house. ④：Look! The children are across（across, on） the bridge. ③：Some birds are flying on（on, over） the wall. ⑥：Two cats are running along（between, along） the wall. ⑦：There is a box on（over, on） the table. ⑧：Is there any water in（into, in） the kettle.

docs.title: 一​：​如何​表达​“​等​一下​”？
docs.text: wait a minute.（​等​一下​）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​使用​“why can't”？
docs.text:
“why can't”​这种​说法​其实​是​“why can”​的​反义​，​意思​为​“​为什么​不能​...?”。

​这样​的​用法​在​新​概念​英语​第二册​当中​会​较为​普遍​。

​单词​

/kæn/、/kən/ can modal verb.​能够​ /bɒs/ boss n.[C]​老板​，​上司​ /ˈmɪnɪt/ minute n.[C]​分​（​钟​） /ɑːsk/ ask v.​请求​，​要求​ /ˈhændraɪtɪŋ/ handwriting n.[U]​书写​，​手写​ /ˈterəbl/ terrible adj.​糟糕​的​，​可怕​的​

​短语​

wait a minute ​等​一下​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​简短​回答​问题​ ​例​：Can a dog swim? - Yes, it can. ①：Can you bring me some books? - Yes, I can. ②：Can she write English? - Yes, she can. ③：Can he cook? - Yes, he can. ④：Can Bob go to the United States? - Yes, he can. ⑤：Can you see China on the map? - Yes, we can. ⑥：Can I turn off the television? - Yes, you can. ​例​：Can a cat swim? - No, it can't. ①：Can we eat grass? - No, we can't. ②：Can birds swim under water? - No, it can't. ③：Can you buy a car now? - No, I can't. ④：Can he type? - No, he can't ⑤：Can she dance? - No, she can't. ⑥：Can your son cook? - No, he can't. ​例​：Who can cut my hair?（the hairdresser） - The hairdresser can. ①：Who can speak Korean?（I） - I can. ②：Who can lift this stereo?（my brother） - My brother can. ③：Who can translate this?（Marisa） - Marisa can. ④：Who can make biscuits?（her mother） - Her mother can. ⑤：Who can answer this question?（you） - You can. ⑥：Who can paint the walls for us?（the men） - The men can. ​二​：​仿照​例句​，​用​“Can you ...”​的​句型​改写​句子​ ​例​：Shut the windows! - Can you shut the windows, please? ①：Open the door! - Can you open the door, please? ②：Type these letters! - Can you type these letters, please? ③：Turn off the light! - Can you turn off the light, please? ④：Give me the teapot! - Can you give me the teapot, please? ⑤：Turn on the tap! - Can you turn on the tap, please? ⑥：Wash the dishes! - Can you wash the dishes, please?

docs.title: 如何​表达​“​小菜一碟​”？
docs.text:
so easy. = a pieck of cake.（​小菜一碟​）

​练习​

“be+doing”、“be going to do”、“can” 1. put on coat、wash dish、open window ①：What is she doing?（​那位​女​的​在​干什么​呢​？） ②：She is washing her dishes.（​她​正在​清洗​她​的​盘子​。） ③：What's she going to do?（​她​要​去​做​什么​吗​？） ④：She's going to open the window.（​她​要​去​打开​窗户​。） ⑤：What can she do?（​她​能够​做​什么​？） ⑥：She can put on her coat.（​她​可以​传​她​的​外套​。） 2. wait for bus、make bookcase、paint to wall ①：What's he doing?（​他​在​干什么​？） ②：He's waiting for the bus.（​他​正在​等​公交车​。） ③：What's he going to do?（​他​要​去​做​什么​？） ④：He's going to making a bookcase.（​他​要​去​做​书柜​。） ⑤：What can he do?（​他​能够​做​什么​？） ⑥：He can paint the wall.（​他​能够​刷墙​。） 3. drink its milk、cilmb the wall、run across grass ①：What's cat doing?（​那​只​猫​正在​做​什么​？） ②：It's drinking its milk.（​它​正在​喝​它​的​牛奶​。） ③：What's cat going to do?（​那​只​猫​要​去​做​什么​？） ④：It's going to cilmb the wall.（​它​要​去​爬墙​） ⑤：What can cat do?（​猫​能够​做​什么​？） ⑥：It can run across grass.（​它​能够​跑​过​草地​。）

​单词​

/lɪft/ lift v.​拿​起​，​搬起​，​举起​ /keɪk/ cake n.​饼​，​蛋糕​ /ˈbɪskɪt/ biscuit n.[C]​饼干​

​短语​

a pieck of cake ​小菜一碟​[​与​“so easy”​相似​]

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​造句​ ​例​：I/speak English/not German - I can speak English but I can't speak German. ①：William/write English/not Chinese - William can write English but he can't write Chinese. ②：a dog/swim/not climb up a tree - A dog can swim but it can't climb up a tree. ③：she/play basketball/not football - She can play basketball but can't play football. ④：they/speak Japanese/not write it - They can speak Japanese but can't write it. ​二​：​仿照​例句​回答​问题​ ​例​：What language can you speak?（English） - I/We can speak Englsh. ①：What language can Ken speak?（French） - Ken can speak French. ②：What can you make, bread or cakes?（bread） - I can make bread. ③：Which book can you read, the thick one or the thin one?（the thick one） - I can read the thick one. ④：Where can he teach, in a school or in a university?（in a university） - He can teach in a university.

docs.title: Lesson 47：A cup of coffee.（​一杯​咖啡​）
一​：​一般​现在​时
docs.text:
“​一般​现在​时​”​是​表示​客观事实​、​存在​状态​或​习惯​动作​，​既​可以​站​在​现在​（Now），​也​可以​站​在​将来​（Future）​或​过去​（Past），​并​不会​只​站​在​现在​、​将来​或​过去​当中​的​某​一个​状态​。

  *--------------*-------------*
​过去​（Past）   ​现在​（Now）   ​将来​（Future）
  | ------------ | ----------- |

docs.title: 语法​：​一般​现在​时​的​肯定句
docs.text:
​结构​：​主语​ + ​谓语​动词​ + ​其它​

​例子​

①：I want this house.（​我​想要​这个​房子​。 | この​家​が​欲​しい。） ②：I like drink water.（​我​喜欢​喝水​。 | ​水​を​飲​むのが​好​きです。） ③：I love Marisa.（​我​喜欢​玛丽​莎​。 | マリサが​好​きです。）

docs.title: 语法​：​一般​现在​时​的​否定句
docs.text:
​结构​：​主语​ + not + ​谓语​动词​ + ​其它​

PS：*do not = don't

​例子​

①：I don't want this job.（​我​不​想要​这份​工作​。 | この​仕事​はやりたくないです。） ②：I don't like tea.（​我​不​喜欢​喝茶​。 | お​茶​を​飲​むのは​好​きではありません。） ③：I don't love you.（​我​不​喜欢​你​。 | ​私​はあなたを​愛​していない。）

docs.title: 语法​：​一般​现在​时​的​一般​疑问句
docs.text:
​结构​：​谓语​动词​ + ​主语​ + ​其它​

​例子​

①：Do you want this job?（​你​想要​这份​工作​吗​？ | この​仕事​が​欲​しいですか？） ②：Do you like tea?（​你​喜欢​茶​吗​？ | お​茶​は​好​きですか？） ③：Do you love him?（​你​喜欢​他​吗​？ | ​彼​のことが​好​きですか？）

docs.title: 语法​：​一般​现在​时​的​特殊​疑问句
docs.text:
​结构​：​特殊​疑问词​ + ​谓语​动词​ + ​主语​ + ​其它​[​去掉​答案​]

​例子​

I want this job.（​我​想要​这份​工作​。 | この​仕事​がしたいです。） -- Do you want this job?（​你​想要​这份​工作​吗​？ | この​仕事​が​欲​しいですか？） -- What do you want?（​你​想要​什么​？ | ​何​が​欲​しいですか？）

docs.title: 二​：​语气​强调​“do”
docs.text:
​在​汉语​中​我们​可以​用​比如​“​真的​、​尤其​、​确实​”​等​词来​表达​强调​的​意思​。

​在​英语​中​也​可以​用​例如​“do”​等​词来​表达​强调​的​意思​。

​例子​

I want this house.（​我​想要​这个​房子​。 | この​家​が​欲​しい。） -- I do want this house.（​我​是​真的​想要​这个​房子​。 | この​家​が​本当​に​欲​しいです。）

​单词​

/laɪk/ like v.​喜欢​，​想要​ /wɒnt/ want v.​想​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​回答​问题​ ​例​：Do you want any apples?（a pound） - Yes, I do, Give me a pound of apples, please. ①：Do you want any pencils?（three） - Yes, I do. Give me three pencils, please. ②：Do you want any boxes?（two） - Yes, I do. Give me two boxes, please. ③：Do you want any chocolate?（a large bar） - Yes, I do. Give me a large bar of chocolate, please. ​例​：Do you want any coffee? - No, I don't. I don't like coffee. ①：Do you want any whisky? - No, I don't. I don't like whisky. ②：Do you want any bread? - No, I don't. I don't like bread. ③：Do you want any honey? - No, I don't. I don't like honey. ​二​：​仿​例句​回答​问题​ ​例​： ①：Do you want a banana?（yes） - Yes, please. I like bananas. ②：Do you want any butter?（no/cheese） - No, thank you, but I want some cheese. ①：Do you want a cup of tea?（yes） - Yes, please. I like tea. ②：Do you want any biscuits?（yes） - Yes, please. I like biscuits. ③：Do you want a cup of black coffee?（yes） - Yes, please. I like black coffee. ④：Do you want any wine?（no/beer） - No, thank you, but I want some beer. ⑤：Do you want any sugar?（no/honey） - No, thank you, but I want some honey. ⑥：Do you want any fruit?（no/jam） - No, thank you, but I want some jam. ​三​：​仿照​例句​回答​问题​ ​例​：Do you like cheese on your bread?（butter） - No, I don't. But I like butter on my bread. ①：Do you like cream in your coffee?（milk） - No, I don't. But I like milk in my coffee. ②：Do you like ice in your whisky?（in beer） - No, I don't. But I like ice in my beer. ③：Do you like pure milk in an ice cream?（chocolate） - No, I don't. But I like chocolate in an ice cream.

docs.title: Lesson 48：Do you like ...?（​你​喜欢​...​吗​?）　　　　　   Do you want ...?（​你​想要​...​吗​？）
docs.text:
​练习​

​一般​现在​时​的​一般​疑问句​ 1. eggs ①：Do you like eggs?（​你​喜欢​鸡蛋​吗​？ | ​卵​は​好​きですか？） ②：Yes, I do. But I don't want one.（​是​的​，​我​喜欢​。​但​我​不想​只要​一个​。 | はい、​好​きですが、​一​つだけが​欲​しくない。） 2. butter ①：Do you like butter?（​你​喜欢​黄油​吗​？ | バターは​好​きですか？） ②：Yes, I do. But I don't want any.（​是​的​，​我​喜欢​。​但​我​不想​只要​一点​。 | はい、​好​きですが、ちょっとだけはしたくない。） 2. oranges ①：Do you like oranges?（​你​喜欢​黄油​吗​？ | バターは​好​きですか？） ②：Yes, I do. But I don't want one.（​是​的​，​我​喜欢​。​但​我​不想​只要​一个​。 | はい、​好​きですが、​一​つだけが​欲​しくない。）

​单词​

/freʃ/ fresh adj.​新鲜​的​ /eg/ egg n.[C]​鸡蛋​ /'bʌtə/ butter n.[U]​黄油​ /pjʊə/ pure adj.​纯净​的​ /ˈhʌni/ honey n.[U]​蜂蜜​ /raɪp/ ripe adj.​成熟​的​ /bəˈnɑːnə/ banana n.[C]​香蕉​ /dʒæm/ jam n.[C/U]​果酱​ /swiːt/ sweet adj.​甜​的​ /ɒrɪndʒ/ orange n.[C]​橙子​ /skɒtʃ-ˈwɪski/ Scotch whisky ​苏格兰​威士忌​ /tʃɔɪs/ choice adj.​上​等​的​，​精选​的​ /ˈæpl/ apple n.[C/U]​苹果​ /waɪn/ wine n.[C/U]​红酒​，​果酒​，​葡萄酒​ /bɪə/ beer n.[U/C]​啤酒​ /ˈblækbɔːd/ blackboard n.[C]​黑板​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​写出​各句​的​对应​句​ ​例​： ①：There's a small apple on the plate.（big） - I don't want a small on. I want a big one. ②：There are some red apples in the basket.（green） - I don't want any red one's. I want some green ones. ①：This ice cream is for you.（that） - I don't want this one. I want that one. ②：Here's a cup of coffee for you.（a cup of tea） - I don't want a cup of coffee. I want a cup of tea. ③：I'm going to buy you a bottle of beer.（wine） - I don't want a bottle of beer. I want a bottle of wine. ④：There are some short pencils in the box.（long） - I don't want any short ones. I want long ones. ⑤：Here are two blue hats.（red） - I don't want any blue ones. I want red ones. ⑥：There are some biscuits in the cupboard.（a cake） - I don't want any biscuits. I want a cake. ​二​：​仿照​例句​回答​问题​ ​例​：Do you like cheese and butter? - I like cheese, but I don't like butter. ①：Do you like green tea and black tea? - I like green tea, but I don't like black tea. ②：Do you like red wine and white wine? - I like red wine, but I don't like white wine. ③：Do you like honey and jam? - I like honey, but I don't like jam. ④：Do you like English and Japanese? - I like English, but I don't like Japanese.

docs.title: 一​：​如何​表达​“​牛排​几分​熟​”？
docs.text:
How do you like your steak?（​你​想要​几分​熟​的​牛排​？）

  1. raw：​全生​；
  2. rare：​一分​熟​；
  3. medium rare：​三分​熟​；
  4. medium：​五分​熟​；
  5. medium well：​七分​熟​；
  6. well done：​全熟​。

docs.title: 二​：​如何​表达​“​我​也​不是​”？
docs.text:
Me either.（​我​也​不是​。）

either（​英​：/ˈaɪðə/，​美​：/ˈiːðər/）

“either”​用​在​与​“too”​相反​的​否定​句式​上​，​表​“​也​不​...”。

docs.title: 三​：​动词​的​第三人称​单数​？
docs.text:
“​第三人称​单数​”​是​指​英语​中​的​“​第三人称​单数​词​（He、She、It​等​）”​作为​主语​的​形式​。

​当为​一般​现在​时​的​句子​当中​出现​了​由​第三人称​（He、She、It、They​等​）​且​为​单数​（He、She、It​等​）​的​词​作为​主语​部分​时​，​其为​一般​现在​时​的​句子​当中​作为​谓语​动词​部分​的​动词​就​需要​变为​动词​的​第三人称​单数​（v. s）​形式​。

​例子​

I like this house.（​我​喜欢​这里​的​房子​。） He likes this house.（​他​喜欢​这里​的​房子​。）

​为什么​动词​的​第三人称​单数​需要​在​动词​的​后面​加​“s”​呢​？

​这是​英语​中​的​一种​语法​规则​，​叫做​主谓​一致​。​这​意味着​动词​必须​与​主语​在​数量​和​人称​上​保持一致​。​当​主语​是​第三人称​单数​名词​或​代词​时​，​我们​需要​在​动词​后面​加上​“s”。

​动词​的​第三人称​单数​的​变化​方式​跟​名词​的​单数​变为​复数​的​形式​相同​。

docs.title: 1. v. -s
docs.text:
​直接​在​动词​词尾​加上​“-s”。

​例如​“likes​和​wants​等​”

docs.title: 2. v. -es
docs.text:
​如果​动词​词尾​是​“s、x、ch、sh、o”​为​结尾​的话​，​则​需要​加上​“-es”。

​例如​“watches、goes​和​washes”​等​。

docs.title: 3. v. -y → -i -es
docs.text:
​如果​动词​词尾​是​“​辅音​字母​ + y ​结尾​”​的话​，​需要​将​词尾​的​“ y ​结尾​”​变为​“ i ​结尾​”​再​加上​“-es”。

​例如​“cry → cries、fry → fries”​等​。

docs.title: 4. v. -y -es
docs.text:
​如果​动词​词尾​是​“​元音​字母​ + y ​结尾​”​的话​，​直接​加上​“-s”​即可​。

​例如​“buy → buys、say → says”​等​。

docs.title: 四​：​一般​现在​时​的​“does”？
docs.text:
什么​是​一般​现在​时​？

“​一般​现在​时​”​是​表示​客观事实​、​存在​状态​或​习惯​动作​，​既​可以​站​在​现在​（Now），​也​可以​站​在​将来​（Future）​或​过去​（Past），​并​不会​只​站​在​现在​、​将来​或​过去​当中​的​某​一个​状态​。

  *--------------*-------------*
​过去​（Past）   ​现在​（Now）   ​将来​（Future）
  | ------------ | ----------- |

“Does”​是​一般​现在​时中​的​第三人称​单数​形式​的​动词​“do”​的​形式​。

“do”​放在​句子​当中​可表​强调​的​语气​意思​。​当其​放在​了​作​主语​的​第三人称​单数​词​（He、She、It​等​）​的​后面​时​，“do”​需要​变为​“does”。

​例子​

I do want this job.（​我​真的​很​想要​这份​工作​） He does want this job.（​他​真的​很​想要​这份​工作​。）

“does”​的​否定​形式​为​“does not = doesn't”。

​例子​

He does want this job.（​他​真的​很​想要​这份​工作​。） He doesn't want this job.（​他​真的​不​想要​这份​工作​。）

docs.title: 五​：“some”​的​例外​用法
docs.text:
​在​Lesson 27​当中​我们​学习​了​关于​“some”​和​“any”​的​用法​。

​一般​情况​下​“some”​用于​肯定​句式​当中​，​而​“any”​用于​否定​句式​和​疑问句​式​当中​。

​当​如果​一条​疑问句​是​为表​建议​或​请求​并​希望​得到​肯定​回答​的​时候​，​得​用​“some”​代替​“any”。

​单词​

/ˈbʊtʃə/ butcher n.[C]​卖肉​者​ /miːt/ meat n.[U]（​使用​）​肉​ /læm/ lamb n.[C/U]​羔羊​肉​ /ˈhʌzbənd/ husband n.[C]​丈夫​ /steɪk/ steak n.[C/U]​牛排​ /mɪns/ mince n.[U]​肉馅​ /ˈtʃɪkɪn/ chicken n.[C/U]​鸡​、​鸡肉​ /tel/ tell v.​告诉​ /truːθ/ truth n.[U]​实情​ /ˈaɪðə/ either adv.​也​（​用于​否定句​当中​）

​短语​

How do you like your steak? ​你​想要​几分​熟​的​牛排​？

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​回答​问题​ ​例​：Does he like steak?（some pieces） - Yes, he does, He wants some pieces of steak. ①：Does he like beef?（two pounds） - Yes, he does. He wants two pounds of beef. ②：Does your son like bread?（three loaves） - Yes, he does. He wants three loaves of bread. ③：Does Linda like wine?（a bottle） - Yes, she does. She wants a bottle of wine. ​例​：Does he want any cabbages? - No, he doesn't. He doesn't like cabbages. ①：Does your wife want any lamb? - No, she doesn't. She doesn't like lamb. ②：Does Tom want any lettuces? - No, he doesn't. He doesn't like lettuces. ③：Does he want any coffee? - No, he doesn't. He doesn't like coffee. ​二​：​仿照​例句​根据​答案​提问​，​并​做​必要​的​修改​ ​例​：Does he like chicken? - No, he doesn't. He doesn't like chicken. What about beef? - No, he doesn't like beef, either. ①：Does she like garden beef? - No, she doesn't. She doesn't like garden beef. Wat about cabbages? - No, she doesn't like cabbages, either. ②：Does he like butter? - No, he doesn't. He doesn't like butter. What about jam? - No, he doesn't like jam, either. ③：Does he like eggs? - No, he doesn't. He doesn't like eggs. What about grapes? - No, he doesn't like grapes, either. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​造句​ ​例​：he/some oranges/some peaches - He wants some oranges, and he wants some peaches, too. ①：that woman/a pound of sugar/a jar of honey - That woman wants a pound of sugar, and she wants a jar of honey, too. ②：the old man/two pounds of peas/six tomatoes - The old man wants two pounds of peas. and he wants six tomatoes, too. ③：Marisa/thirteen loaves of bread/a pound of cheese - Marisa wants thirteen loaves of bread. and she wants a pound of cheese, too.

docs.title: Lesson 5: Nice to meet you.（​很​高兴​见到​你​）
一​：​如何​区分​英文​中​的​姓​与​名​？
docs.text:
​在​汉语​当中​，​姓名​是​“​姓​在​前​，​名​在​后​”（​例​：​孔​[​姓​] ​阳泽​[​名​]）。

​在​英文​当中​顺序​恰好相反​，​为​“​名​在​前​，​姓​在​后​”（​例​：Stephen[​名​] William[​中间​名​] Hawking[​姓​]（​斯蒂芬​·​威廉​·​霍金​））

​补充​： [​名​]：first name/given name（​第一个​名字​/​别人​给​起​的​名字​） [​中间​名​]：middle name [​姓​]：surname/family name/last name（​名字​的​姓​/​家族​的​名字​/​最后​一个​出现​的​姓​）

docs.title: 二​：​入境​登记卡​（Arrival card）[​姓​与​名​]
三​：​如何​表达​“​我​也​是​”？
docs.text: /tuː/ too adj.​过于​，​而且​，​也​ ​例​：A：I like this shirt. B：Me too.（A：​我​很​喜欢​这件​短袖​。B：​我​也​是​。 | A: ​私​はこのTシャツがとても​好​きです。 B: ​私​も。）

docs.title: 1.a/an ​的​含义
docs.text:
​以​目前​所学​到​的​知识​，​可以​将​其​简单​地​认为​是​“​一个​”​的​意思​。

​例​： Sophie is a new student.（​苏菲​是​一位​新​学生​ | ソフィーは​新入生​です。） This is not an umbrella.（​这​不是​一把​雨伞​ | これは​傘​ではありません。）

docs.title: 2.a/an ​的​位置
docs.text:
a/an ​用于​单个​的​可数名词​前​，​表示​数量​“​一个​”。

​例​： a pen.（​一支​钢笔​ | ​一​つのペン） an apple.（​一个​苹果​ | ​一​つのリンゴ）

docs.title: 3.a/an ​的​区别
docs.text:
​二者​区别​在于​，“a”​用于​辅音​音标​前​，​一般​读作​e，​而​“an”​则​用于​元音​音标​前​，​一般​读​做​an。

​例​： a pen（“p”​为​辅音​音标​，​加​“a”） an apple（“a”​为​元音​音标​，​加​“an”） an egg（“e”​为​元音​音标​，​加​“an”）

​如果​当​一个​单词​的​首字母​不​发音​的​情况​下​，​则​需要​看​单词​第一个​发音​的​音标​为​辅音​音标​/​元音​音标​，​再​来​判断​加​“a/an”。

​例​： an hour（“o”​为​元音​音标​，​加​“an”） a university（/ˌjuːnɪˈvɜːsəti/，/j/​为​辅音​音标​，​加​“a”）

​单词​

/mɪstə/ Mr. n.（​用于​男子​的​姓氏​或​姓名​前​）​先生​[​常用​] ​例​：Mr. Bean（​潘豆​先生​） ​补充​：Mr. +（last name/surname）（​最后​一个​出现​的​姓​/​名字​当中​的​姓​） ​例​（chitchat）：Mr. Blake; call me David please.（Blake​先生​；​管​我​叫​ David ​就行了​。） /mɪstə/ Miss. n.(​用于​未婚​女子​姓氏​或​姓名​前​)​小姐​，​女士​[​常用​] /ˈmɪsɪz/ Mrs. n.(​用于​已婚​女子​姓氏​或​姓名​前​)​小姐​，​女士​ /mɪz/ Ms. n.（​用于​婚姻状况​不明​或​不愿​提及​婚姻​状況​的​女子​的​姓氏​或​姓名​之前​）​小姐​，​女士​ /ˌɡʊd ˈmɔː.nɪŋ/ good morning int.（​上午​见面​时​用语​）​早上好​，​上午​好​ ​补充​： ①：​非正式​场合​常说​ Morning ； ②：​还有​以下​的​词​： good afternoon（/ˌɡʊd ˌɑːf.təˈnuːn/，​中午​好​） good evening（/ˌɡʊd ˈiːv.nɪŋ/，​下午​好​） good night（/ˌɡʊd ˈnaɪt/，​晚上​好​） /njuː/ new adj.​刚​出现​的​; ​新​的​ /ˈstjuːdənt/ student n.​学生​ ​补充​：​一个​单词​如果​最​前面​为​ /s/ ​随后​跟着​一个​清​辅音​的话​，​后面​的​清​辅音​需要​变为​相对​应​的​浊辅音​。 ​例​：/ˈstjuːdənt/ --> /ˈsdjuːdənt/ /frentʃ/ French adj.​法国​的​；n.​法国人​，​法国​ /ˈdʒɜːmən/ German adj.​德国​的​；n.​德国人​，​德国​ /ˌdʒæpəˈniːz/ Japanese adj.​日本​的​、​日本​人​的​；n.​日本​人​、​日语​； ​补充​（chitchat）：​夸赞​他们​国家​的​特色​食品​也​是​一个​很​好​的​搭讪​方式​（​例​：I love sushi.(​我​喜欢​你们​那边​的​寿司​)） /kəˈriən/ Korean adj.​朝鲜​(​或​韩国​)​的​、​朝鲜​(​或​韩国​)​人​的​；n.​韩国​人​、 ​韩国语​ ​补充​（chitchat）：​夸赞​他们​国家​的​特色​食品​也​是​一个​很​好​的​搭讪​方式​（​例​：I love kimchi.(​我​喜欢​你们​那边​的​韩国泡菜​)） /tʃaɪˈniːz/ Chinese adj.​中国​的​、​中华民族​的​、​中文​的​；n.​中国​人​、​华人​、​汉语​; ​补充​： ①：​既​可以​代表​国籍​的​“​中国​；​中国​人​”，​也​可以​代表​血统​的​“​华籍​”​等​。 ②：Mandarin（​普通话​） ​与​ Cantonese（​粤语​） /tuː/ too adj.​过于​，​而且​，​也​ ​例​：A：I like this shirt. B：Me too.（A：​我​很​喜欢​这件​短袖​。B：​我​也​是​。）

​短语​

Nice to meet you （​用于​初次​与​朋友​或​同学​见面​等​非正式​的​场合​）​很​高兴​见到​你​ ​补充​： How do you do?（​相对​比较​正式​的​问候​，​现在​几乎​没人用​，​您好​） How are you.（​你好​吗​） Hi.（​氦​(bushi)，​嗨​！） This is everybody ​这是​大家​ ​例​： Hi Alan, this is everybody.（​嗨​，​艾伦​，​这是​大家​）

​语法​练习​ 
1.​在​单词​前​加上​ a/an
​例​： a car；an umbrella。

a teacher；a school；a suit；a pencil；a shirt；a student；a watch；a morning；a house；a university。
an American car；an Italian house；an English teacher。

2.​模仿​例句​回答​问题​
Is Alice a new student?(yes)  -- Yes, she is.
Is she Japanese?(American)  -- No, she isn't. She is American.

①：Is Anna a new teacher?(yes)  -- Yes, she is.
   Is she Italian?(English)  -- No, she isn't. She is English.
②：Is Hans an old teacher?(yes)  -- Yes, he is.
   Is he French?(German)  -- No, he isn't. He is German.
③：Is Kawabata a nice man?(yes)  -- Yes, he is.
   Is he Korean?(Japanese)  -- No, he isn't. He is Japanese.

3.​模仿​例句​回答​问题​并​写出​相应​的​疑问句​
​例句​：
What nationality is  ...?
What's his/her name?
What make is your car?

​例​：
What nationality is Sophie?  -- Sophie is French.
What his name?  -- His name is Michael.

①：What make is your car?  -- It's a Toyota.
②：What nationality is William?  -- William is English.
③：What's her name?  -- Her name is Naoko.

docs.title: Lesson 50：He likes ...（​他​喜欢​...）　　　　　   But he does't like ...（​但是​他​不​喜欢​...）
docs.text:
​练习​

​一般​现在​时​ + ​动词​第三人称​单数​ 1. tomato ①：He likes tomatoes?（​他​喜欢​西红柿​吗​？ | ​彼​はトマトが​好​きですか？） ②：Yes, he likes. But he doesn't want any.（​是​的​，​他​喜欢​。 ​但​他​现在​不​想要​。 | はい、​彼​は​好​きです。しかし、​今欲​しくないです。） 2. cabbage ①：Does he like cabbage?（​他​喜欢​卷心菜​吗​？ | ​彼​はキャベツが​好​きですか？） ②：Yes, he does.（​是​的​，​他​喜欢​。 | はい、​彼​は​好​きです。） ③：He likes cabbage. But he doesn't want any.（はい、​彼​はキャベツが​好​きです。しかし、​欲​しくないのです。） 3. pea ①：Does she like pea?（​她​喜欢​豌豆​吗​？ | ​彼女​はエンドウ​豆​が​好​きですか?） ②：Yes, she likes. But she doesn't want any.（​是​的​，​她​喜欢​，​但​她​现在​不​想要​。 | はい、​彼女​は​好​きです。しかし、​今欲​しくないです。）

​单词​

/təˈmɑːtəʊ/ tomato n.[C/U]​西红柿​ /pəˈteɪtəʊ/ potato n.[C/U]​马铃薯​、​土豆​ /ˈkæbɪdʒ/ cabbage n.[C/U]​卷心菜​ /ˈletɪs/ lettuce n.[C/U]​莴苣​、​生菜​ /piː/ pea n.[C]​豌豆​ /biːn/ bean n.[C]​豆角​ /peə/ pear n.[C/U]​梨​ /ɡreɪp/ grape n.[C]​葡萄​ /piːtʃ/ peach n.[C/U]​桃子​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​合并​句子​ ​例​：He wants some apples./He doesn't want any oranges. He wants some apples, but he doesn't want any oranges. ①：He likes butter./He doesn't like cheese. - He likes butter, but he doesn't like cheese. ②：John likes grapes./He doesn't like apples. - John likes grapes, but he doesn't like apples. ③：Mrs. Bird wants two fresh lettuces./She doesn't want any garden peas. - Mrs. Bird wants two fresh lettuces, but she doesn't want any garden peas. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​提问​并​回答​问题​ ​例​：you/pears/peaches/my son - Do you like pears or peaches? -- I like pears, but my son doesn't. He likes peaches. ①：he/jam/honey/his brother - Does he like jam or honey? -- He likes jam, but his brother doesn't. He likes honey. ②：she/grapes/bananas/her husband - Does she like grapes or bananas? -- She likes grapes, but her husband doesn't. He likes bananas. ③：you/tea/coffee/Jane - Do you like tea or coffee? -- I like tea, but Jane doesn't. She likes coffee.

docs.title: 一​：​一般​现在​时​的​“​客观事实​/​存在​状态​（do/does）”​是​如何​体现​的​？
docs.text:
​一般​现在​时​的​“​客观事实​/​存在​状态​”​可以​用来​描述​事物​或​人物​的​特征​、​状态​；​经常性​的​或​习惯性​动作​；​描述​客观现实​。

​例子​
  1. ​描述​事物​或​人物​特征​ The sky is blue.（​天空​是​蓝色​的​。 | ​空​が​青​いです。）
  2. ​描述​经常性​或​习惯性​的​动作​ My mother often read the books.（​我​妈妈​经常​看书​。 | ​私​の​母​はよく​本​を​読​みます。）
  3. ​描述​客观现实​ The earth travels around the sun.（​地球​绕​着​太阳​转​。 | ​地球​は​太陽​の​周​りを​回​っています。）

docs.title: be + often/always
docs.text:
​例子​

It's often windy in March.（​三月​的​时候​经常​刮风​。 | 3​月​は​風​が​吹​くことが​多​いです。） It's always warm in April and May.（​四月​和​五月​的​天气​总是​很​温暖​。 | 4​月​から5​月​までの​天​気​はいつも​暖​かいです。）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​使用​“How often（​多长时间​一次​、​多久​）”？
docs.text:
“How often”​的​意思​为​“​多久​”，​主要​用来​提问​“​多长时间​，​某​动作​或​状态​发生​的​频率​”。

​练习​

Does it rain in spring sometimes?（​春天​有时​会​下雨​吗​？ | ​春​には​時​々​雨​が​降​りますか？） -- How often does it rain in spring?（​春天​隔​多长时间​会​下雨​？ | ​春​にはどのくらいの​頻度​で​雨​が​降​りますか?）

docs.title: 三​：“like”​在​句​中表​“​询问​对方​对​某个​地方​或​某件事​物​等​的​看法​”
docs.text:
​在​第四十七章​当中​便​学到​了​“like”​的​动词​意思​。

​但​它​有时候​放在​句子​当中​并​不​表示​“​对​一件​事物​的​兴趣​与​喜好​”​的​意思​，​而表​“​询问​对方​对​某个​地方​或​某件事​物​等​的​看法​”​等​。

​练习​

What's the climate like in GuangZhou?（​广州​那边​的​气候​是​怎么样​的​？ | ​広​州​はどのような​気​候​ですか?）

​单词​

/ɡriːs/ Greece n.​希腊​ /ˈklaɪmət/ climate n.[C/U]​气候​ /ˈkʌntri/ country n.[C]​国家​ /ˈpleznt/ pleasant adj.​宜人​的​ /ˈweðə/ weather n.[U]​天气​ /sprɪŋ/ spring n.[C/U]​春季​ /ˈsʌmə/ summer n.[C/U]​夏季​ /ˈɔːtəm/ autumn n.[C/U]​秋季​ /ˈwɪntə/ winter n.[C/U]​冬季​ /ˈwɪndi/ windy adj.​多风​的​ /wɔːm/ warm adj.​温暖​的​ /reɪn/ rain v.​下雨​ /ˈsʌmtaɪmz/ sometimes adv.​有时​ /snəʊ/ snow v.​下雪​ /ˈdʒænjuəri/ January n.[C/U]​一月​ /ˈfebruəri/ February n.[C/U]​二月​ /mɑːtʃ/ March n.[C/U]​三月​ /ˈeɪprəl/ April n.[C/U]​四月​ /meɪ/ May n.[C/U]​五月​ /dʒuːn/ June n.[C/U]​六月​ /dʒuˈlaɪ/ July n.[C/U]​七月​ /ˈɔːɡəst/ August n.[C/U]​八月​ /sepˈtembə/ September n.[C/U]​九月​ /ɒkˈtəʊbə/ October n.[C/U]​十月​ /nəʊˈvembə/ November n.[C/U]​十一月​ /dɪˈsembə/ December n.[C/U]​十二月​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：When does the sun shine every day?（in July and August） - The sun shine every day in July and August. ①：When is it always windy?（in winter and early spring） - It's always windy in winter and early spring. ②：When does spring come?（in March） - Spring come in March. ③：When is it often sunny?（in autumn） - It's often sunny in autumn. ​二​：​用​所​给​频率​副词​改写​下列​句子​ ​例​：It's hot in August.（always） - It's always hot in August. ②：It's very pleasant here.（always） - It's always very pleasant here. ②：He's late for class.（sometimes） - He's sometimes late for class. ③：The policemen are very tired.（often） - The policemen are often very tired.

docs.title: Lesson 52：What nationality are they?（​他们​是​哪​国人​？）　　　　　   Where do they come from?（​他们​是​来自​于​哪个​国家​的​？）
docs.text:
​练习​

Where do come from（​来自​于​哪个​国家​） 1. U.S ①：Does he come from the U.S?（​他​是​来自​于​美国​吗​？） ②：No, he doesn't come from the U.S.（​不是​，​他​并​不是​来自​于​美国​。） ③：He comes from the Brazil.（​他​来自​于​巴西​。） 2. Holland ①：Does she come from the U.S?（​她​是​来自​于​美国​吗​？） ②：No, she doesn't come from the U.S.（​不是​，​她​并​不是​来自​于​美国​。） ③：She comes from Holland.（​她​是​来自​于​荷兰​。） 3. England ①：Do you both come from Brazil?（​你们​都​是​来自​于​巴西​的​吗​？） ②：No, we don't come from Brazil.（​不​，​我​并​不是​来自​于​巴西​的​。） ③：We come from England.（​我​是​来自​于​英国​的​。） 4. France ①：Do they come from Gerany?（​你们​是​来自​于​德国​的​吗​？） ②：No, they don't come from Germany.（​不​，​我们​不是​来自​于​德国​的​。） ③：They come from France.（​我们​是​来自​于​法国​的​。）

​单词​

The U.S ​美国​ /brəˈzɪl/ Brazil n.​巴西​ /'hɒlənd/ Holland n.​荷兰​ /ˈɪŋɡlənd/ England n.​英国​ /ˈfrɑːns/ France n.​法国​ /ˈdʒɜːməni/ Germany n.​德国​ /ɪtəlɪ/ Italy n.​意大利​ /ˈnɔːweɪ/ Norway n.​挪威​ /rʌʃə/ Russia n.​俄罗斯​ /speɪn/ Spain n.​西班牙​ /ˈswɪdən/ Sweden n.​瑞典​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​使用​“speak, come”​以及​“be”​的​正确​形式​填空​ ①：Mr. Brown is English; he comes from England. He speaks English; his language is English ②：Mrs. Longhi is Italian; she comes from Italy. She speaks Italian; her language is Italian ③：Are you Italian? - No, I am not. I am Mexican; I come from Mexico. I speak Spanish; my language is spanish. ④：what about you, Inge and Anna? - We AreDanishi; we come from Denmark. We speak Danish; our language is Danish. ⑤：My friend, Hans is German; he comes from Germany. He speaks German; his language is German. ⑤：Kathy is American; she comes from the United States. She speaks English; her language is English. ⑥：Her brother is Norwegian; he comes from Norway. He speaks Norwegian; his language is Norwegian. ​二​：​将​下列​句子​翻译​为​英文​ ​例​：​一年​有​四季​ - ​春​、​夏​、​秋​、​冬​，​每个​季节​是​三个​月​。 - There are four seasons in a year, spring, summer, autumn and winter. Each season is three months long. ①：​春天​经常​很​暖和​，​时而​会​下雨​。 - It's always very warm in spring, but it rains sometimes. ②：​夏天​特别​热​，​天天​都​是​大晴天​。 - It's very hot in summer. The sun shines every day. ③：​秋天​时常​刮风​，​有时​下雨​。 - It's often windy in autumn, and it rains sometimes.

docs.title: 如何​表达​“​对话​”？
docs.text: /ˌkɒnvəˈseɪʃn/ conversation n.[C/U]​谈话​

docs.title: 名词​如何​起到​动词​的​作用​？
docs.text:
​一般来说​，​名词​本身​是​不​可能​起到​动词​的​作用​的​。

​如果​需要​让​名词​起到​动词​的​作用​，​就​需要​使​其​动词化​。

docs.title: 动词​名词​化​“have”
docs.text:
​结构​：have + n.[​名词​]

​例子​

①：have a conversation.（​进行​交谈​。 | ​会話​する。） ②：They are having a conversation.（​他们​正在​交谈​。 | ​彼​らは​会話​中​です。） ③：It's our favourite subject of conversation.（​这是​我们​最​喜欢​谈论​的​话题​。 | それは​私​たちのお​気​に​入​りの​話題​です。）

​单词​

/maɪld/ mild adj.​温和​的​，​温暖​的​ /ˈɔːlweɪz/ always adv.​总是​ /nɔːθ/ north n.[U]​北方​ /iːst/ east n.[U]​东方​ /west/ west n.[U]​西方​ /saʊθ/ south n.[U]​南方​ /wet/ wet adj.​潮湿​的​ /ˈsiːzən/ season n.[C]​季节​ ​例​：spring（​春​）/summer（​夏​）/autumn（​秋​）/winter（​冬​） /best/ best adv.​最​... /naɪt/ night n.[C/U]​夜晚​ ​关联​：day（n.[C/U]​白天​） /raɪz/ rise v.​升起​ /ˈɜːli/ early adv.​早​ ​例​：The sun rises early in summer.（​夏天​的​太阳升​得​早​。 | ​夏​には​日​が​昇​るのが​早​いです。） /set/ set v.（​太阳​）​落下去​ /leɪt/ late adv.​晚​，​迟​ ​例​：The sun sets early in winter.（​冬天​太阳​落得​早​。 | ​冬​は​日​が​暮​れるのが​早​いです。） /ˈɪntrəstɪŋ/ interesting adj.​有趣​的​ ​近义​：funny（/ˈfʌni/，adj.​滑稽​的​，​搞笑​地​） ​例​：This book's very interesting.（​这​本书​很​有趣​。 | この​本​はとても​面白​いです。） /ˈsʌbdʒɪkt/ subject n.[C]​话题​ ​近义​（​常见​）：topic（/ˈtɒpɪk/，n.[C]​话题​，​主题​） /ˌkɒnvəˈseɪʃn/ conversation n.[C/U]​谈话​

​短语​

in the north/east/west/south. ​在​ ​东​/​西​/​南​/​北​[​方向​] at ady/night. ​在​ ​白天​/​夜晚​[​表​时间​]

​语法​练习​

​一​：​用​所​给​的​频率​副词​改写​下列​句子​ ​例​：Mrs. Smith goes to the shops.（every day） - Mrs. Smith goes to the shops every day. ①：John cleans his teeth.（every day） - John cleans his teeth every day. ②：My son rides a bike to school, but he goes by bus.（often/sometimes） - My son often rides a bike to school, but he sometimes goes by bus. ③：It rains in spring, but it rains in autumn, too.（sometimes/often） - It sometimes rains in spring, but it often rains in autumn, too. ​二​：​仿照​例句​将​下列​肯定句​改为​否定句​ ​例​：My children often eat lamb. - My children don't often eat lamb. ①：The sun shines every day in summer. - The sun doesn't shine every day in summer. ②：He always speaks English. - He doesn't always speak English. ③：It's always pleasant here in spring. - It's don't always pleasant here in spring. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：Which season do you like best?（spring） - I like spring best. ①：Which language does he like best?（Chinese） - He likes Chinese best. ②：Which book does Helen like best?（New Concept English） - She likes New Concept English best. ③：Which teacher do you like best?（our English teacher） - I like our English teacher best.

docs.title: Lesson 54：What nationality are they?（​他们​是​哪​国人​？）　　　　　   Where do they come from?（​他们​是​来自​哪个​国家​？）
docs.text:
​练习​

do come from? 1. Australia / Australian ①：Where do you come from?（​你​来自​哪里​？ | どこから​来​たのですか？） ②：Are you Australian?（​你​是​澳大利亚人​吗​？ | オーストラリア​人​ですか？） ③：Yes, I come from Australia.（​是​的​，​我​来自​澳大利亚​。 | はい、オーストラリアから​来​ました。） 2. Austria / Austrian ①：Where does he come from?（​他​来自​哪里​？ | ​彼​はどこから​来​たのですか？） ②：Is he Austrian?（​他​是​奥地利人​吗​？ | ​彼​はオーストリア​人​ですか？） ③：Yes, he comes from Austria.（​是​的​，​他​来自​奥地利​。 | はい、​彼​はオーストリアから​来​ました。） 3. Turkey / Turkish ①：Where does she come from?（​她​是​哪里​来​的​？ | ​彼女​はどこから​来​たのですか？） ②：Is she Turkish?（​她​是​土耳其人​吗​？ | ​彼女​はトルコ​人​ですか？） ③：Yes, she comes from Turkey.（​是​的​，​她​来自​土耳其​。 | はい、​彼女​はトルコから​来​ました。）

​单词​

/ˈtʃaɪnə/ China n.​中国​ /dʒə'pæn/ Japan n.​日本​ /saʊθ kəˈriə/ South Korea n.​韩国​ /ɒˈstreɪliə/ Australia n.​澳大利亚​ ​补充​：Australian（/ɒˈstreɪliən/，adj. & n. ​澳大利亚​的​/​人​） /ˈɒstrɪə/ Austria n.​奥地利​ ​补充​：Austrian（/'ɒstriən/，adj. & n. ​奥地利​的​/​人​） /ˈkænədə/ Canada n.​加拿大​ ​补充​：Canadian（/kəˈneɪdiən/，adj. & n. ​加拿大​的​/​人​） /ˈfɪnlənd/ Finland n.​芬兰​ ​补充​：Finnish（/ˈfɪnɪʃ/，adj. ​芬兰​的​） /ˈɪndɪə/ India n.​印度​ ​补充​：Indian（/ˈɪndɪən/，adj. & n. ​印度​的​/​人​） /naɪˈdʒɪərɪə/ Nigeria n.​尼日利亚​ ​补充​：Nigerian（/naɪˈdʒɪərɪən/，adj. & n. ​尼日利亚​的​/​人​） /ˈtɜːkɪ/ Turkey n.​土耳其​ ​补充​：Turkish（/ˈtɜːkɪʃ/，adj. ​土耳其​的​） /ˈpəʊlənd/ Poland n.​波兰​ ​补充​：Polish（/poʊlɪʃ/，adj. & n. ​波兰​的​/​人​） /ˈtaɪlænd/ Thailand n.​泰国​的​ ​补充​：Thai（/taɪ/，adj. & n. ​泰国​的​/​人​）

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​问题​，​且​做​必要​的​改变​ ​例​①：Are you Greek or Italian? - I'm Greek. I come from Greece. ①：Is Sophie English or French?（French） - She's French. She comes from France. ②：Are the tourists Russian or Dutch?（Russian） - They're Russia. They're comes from Russian. ③：Is your father Polish or Turkish?（Turkish） - He's Turkish. He's comes from Turkish. ​例​②：Where do you comme from?（China） - I come from China. ①：Where does your friend come from?（Japan） - My friend comes from Japan. ②：Where do they come from?（Poland） - They come from Poland. ③：Where do these tourists come from?（Austria） - These tourists come from Austria. ​二​：​写出​下列​动词​的​第三人称​单数​形式​ ​例​：teach - teaches ①：give - gives ②：play - plays ③：live - lives ④：shine - shines ⑤：rise - rases ⑥：come - ⑦：do - does ⑧：want - wats ⑨：take - takes ⑩：snow - snows

docs.title: 如何​表达​“​吃​午饭​”？
docs.text: have lunch（​吃​午餐​。 | ​夕食​を​食​べる。）

docs.title: 文章​句型​转换
docs.text:
​一​：The Sawyers live at 87 King Street.（​索耶​一家​住​在​国王​街​ 87 ​号​。 | ソーヤーの​家族​は87キングストリートに​住​んでいます。）

  1. Do the Sawyers live at 87 King Street?（​索耶​一家​住​在​国王​街​ 87 ​号​吗​？ | ソーヤーの​家族​は87キングストリートに​住​んでいますか？）[​一般​疑问句​]
  2. Where do the Sawyers live?（​索耶​一家​住​在​哪里​？ | ソーヤーの​家族​はどこに​住​んでいますか？）[​特殊​疑问句​(where)]
  3. Who do live at 87 King Street?（​谁​住​在​国王​街​ 87 ​号​？ | 87キングストリートは​今​誰​が​住​んでいますか？）[​特殊​疑问句​[who]]

​二​：Mr. Sawyer goes to work in the morning.（​索耶​先生​早上​去​上班​。 | ソーヤー​氏​は​朝仕事​に​行​きます。）

  1. Does Mr. Sawyer go to work in the morning?（​索耶​先生​早上​去​上班​吗​？ | ソーヤー​氏​は​朝仕事​に​行​きますか？）[​一般​疑问句​]
  2. When does Mr. Sawyer go to work?（​索耶​先生​什么​时候​去​上班​？ | ソーヤー​氏​はいつ​仕事​に​行​きますか？）[​特殊​疑问句​(when)]
  3. Why does Mr. Sawyer go to work in the morning?（​索耶​先生​为什么​要​在​早上​上班​？ | なぜソーヤー​氏​は​朝仕事​に​行​きますか？）[​特殊​疑问句​(why)]
  4. Who goes to work in the morning?（​谁​早上​去​上班​？ | ​朝​に​誰​が​仕事​に​行​きますか？）[​特殊​疑问句​(who)]
​单词​

/lɪv/ live v.​居住​，​生活​ ​用法​： ①：live in + ​国家​城市​； ②：live at + ​门牌号​。 ​例子​： ①：She lives in Beijing.（​她​居住​在​北京​。 | ​彼女​は​北京​に​住​んでいます。） ②：Where does she live?（​她​住​在​哪里​？ | ​彼女​はどこに​住​んでいますか?） /steɪ/ stay v.​呆​在​，​留在​ ​用法​： ①：stay in + ​国家​城市​； ②：stay at + ​小​地点​。 ​例子​： ①：He usually stays at home with his child at night.（​晚上​他​通常​呆​在​家里​陪​孩子​。 | ​彼​はいつも​夜子​供​と​一緒​に​家​にいます。） ②：How often does he stay at home at night?（​他​有​多少​次​晚上​待在家里​？ | ​彼​は​夜​どのくらいの​頻度​で​家​にいますか?） /həʊm/ home n.[C/U]​家​；adv.​在家​，​到家​ /ˈjuːʒuəli/ usually adv.​通常​ /ˈhaʊswɜːk/ housework n.​家务​ ​其为​“house”​和​“work”​的​组合体​。 do the housework.（​做​家务​。 | ​家事​をする。） ​相似​：homework（​做​家务​） ​例子​： ①：I'm going to do the housework.（​我要​做​家务​了​。 | ​私​は​家事​をするつもりです。） ②：Can you do the housework?（​你​可以​做​家务​吗​？ | ​家事​はやってもらえますか？） ③：He does housework every night.（​他​每天晚上​都​会​去​做​家务活​。 | ​彼​は​毎​晩​家事​をします。） /lʌntʃ/ lunch n.[C/U]​午餐​ /təˈɡeðə/ together adv.​一起​ ​例​：We always have lunch together.（​我们​总是​一起​吃​午饭​。 | ​私​たちはいつも​一緒​に​夕食​を​食​べます。） /əˈraɪv/ arrive v.​到达​ ​例​：He arrives home late every night.（​他​每天晚上​很晚​才​回到​家​。 | ​彼​は​毎​晩​遅​く​帰​宅​します。） /ˌɑːftəˈnuːn/ afternoon n.[C/U]​下午​，​午后​ ​例​：in the afternoon.（​在​下午​。 | ​午​後​に。） /ˈiːvnɪŋ/ evening n.[C/U]​晚上​ ​例​：in the evening.（​在​晚上​。 | ​夕方​に。）

​语法​练习​

​一​：​在​必要​的​空白处​填​上​“the” ①：Miss Tan goes to work by car every day. She arrives at the office at eight in the morning, and she comes home late in the evening. ②：Mr. and Mrs. Smith usually stay at home in the afternoon. ③：That new student is Austrian. He comes from Austria. ④：They often come home late at night. ⑤：What's the climate like in your country? - It's interesting. It's often cold in the Nroth and windy in the East. ⑥：Our cat drinks milk, but it doesn't drink water. ​二​：​用​所​给​的​动词​的​正确​形式​填空​ Tim's Day Tim wakes（wake） up at eight o'clock in the morning, and gets（get） up at half past eight. He washes（wash） his face and hands and cleans（clean） his teeth. Then he goes（go） downstairs for breakfast. He eats（eat） two eggs and some bread and butter, and he drinks（drink） two or three cups of coffee. Aften breakfast he walks（walk） to Mr. Scott's house. He is（be） often late. He shows（show） Mr. Scott his homework, and there are（be） often mistakes in it. For lunch at noon, he usually eats（eat） three pieces of steak and tomatoes or beans. After lunch he always drinks（drink） a cup of tea with sugar in it. He sometimes sits（sit） in an armchair and reads（read） a newspaper, and sometimes, but not often, he does（do） some work for Mr. Scott. For supper in the evening, he eats（eat） some silces of bread, butter honey and cakes. Then he watches（watch） televison or talks（talk） to friends. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：Do you usually go to school by bus or by bike?（by bike） - I usually go to school by bike. ①：Do you classmates often ask questions in class or aften class?（after class） - They often ask questions aften class. ②：Are your teachers always busy or only sometimes?（always） - They are always busy. ③：Does your friend watch television or do his homework in the evening?（do his homework） - He does his homework in the evening.

docs.title: Lesson 56：What do they usually do?（​他们​通常​做​什么​？）
docs.text:
​练习​

​副词​放在​动词​的​前面​ 1. dusts the cupboard ①：What does she often do in the morning?（​她​经常​在​早上​做​什么​？ | ​彼女​は​朝​によく​何​をしますか？） ②：She often dusts the cupboard in the morning.（​她​经常​在​早上​清扫​橱柜​。 | ​彼女​は​朝​によく​食器​棚​をほこります。） 2. make the bed ①：What does she always do in the morning?（​她​总是​在​早上​做​什么​？ | ​彼女​は​朝​にいつも​何​をしますか？） ②：She always makes the bed in the morning.（​她​总是​在​早上​整理​床铺​。 | ​彼女​はいつも​朝​にベッドを​整理​します。） 3. listen to the stereo ①：What do they sometimes do in the evening?（​他们​有时​在​晚上​做​什么​？ | ​彼​らは​時​々​夕方​に​何​をしますか？） ②：They sometimes listen to the stereo in the evening.（​他们​有时​会​在​晚上​听​立体声​音响​。 | ​彼​らは​時​々​夕方​にステレオを​聴​きます。）

​语法​练习​

​一​：​用​所​给​的​动词​的​正确​形式​填空​ ①：John lives（live） in a small city. He is（be） a student. He gets（get） up early in the morning every day, at seven o'clock, and goes（go） to school by bus. He likes（like） English best. He plays（play） football at school. He gets（get） home four o'clock in the afternoon. Then he does（do） his homework before dinner, and watches（watch） television after dinner in the evening. He usually goes（go） to bed at nine o'clock. ②：Mrs. Scott and her sister Emma are（be） teaches. They teach（teach） in the same school. They go（go） to work by car. They leave（leave） home at seven thirty in the morning, and come（come） back home at four in the afternoon. In the evening, they usually read（read） books, but sometimes they listen（listen） to the stereo. They like（like） their jobs. ​二​：​根据​实际​情况​回答​问题​ ①：Where do you come from? - I come from Japan. ②：Where do you live? - I live Tokyo. ③：Which season(s) do you like best? - I like spring and autumn.

docs.title: Lesson 57：An uusual day（​不​平常​的​一天​）
一​：“by + ​交通工具​”​表​乘坐​交通工具
docs.text:
​在​汉语​当中​，“​乘车​”​一词​的​结构​通常​为​“​动词​ + ​交通工具​”。

​但​在​英语​当中​，​表示​“​乘坐​”​一词​是​以​介词​来​引导​的​“​介词​[by] + ​交通工具​”。

​例子​

①：by car.（​乘坐​私家车​。 | ​車​で） ②：by bus.（​乘坐​公交车​。 | バスに​乗​で）

docs.title: 二​：What time ​与​ When
docs.text:
“when”​与​“what time”​都​可以​用来​询问​时间​,​相当于​汉语​的​“​什么​时候​”,​它们​有时​能​相互​通用​,​但​在​多数​场合​下​却​不能​通用​。

  1. when（​什么​时候​）：​问​范围​较大​的​时间段​，​同时​也​可以​问较​小​范围​的​时间段​；
  2. what time（​什么​时间​）：​一般​问​的​时间​范围​较​小​，​例如​几点​几分​。​一般​不​能够​用于​问​时间跨度​大​的​问题​。

docs.title: 三​：​英文​数字
docs.text:
Lesson 3 ​讲到​了​“​如何​用​ 0~9 ​表达​一切​的​数字​”，​但​在​日常​人们​交流​的​过程​当中​更常​使用​到​的​是​“​英文​数字​”，​这​包括​了​之前​所学​到​的​ 0~9。

​从​数字​ 13 ​开始​有​一定​的​规则​是​用​ -teen ​当字​尾​。

10 ~ 19 ​基数​ ​词​ ​音标​ 10 ten /ten/ 11 eleven /ɪˈlevn/ 12 twelv /twelv/ 13 thirteen /ˌθɜːˈtiːn/ 14 fourteen /ˌfɔːˈtiːn/ 15 fifteen /ˌfɪfˈtiːn/ 16 sixteen /ˌsɪksˈtiːn/ 17 seventeen /ˌsevnˈtiːn/ 18 eighteen /ˌeɪˈtiːn/ 19 nineteen /ˌnaɪnˈtiːn/

20 ​到​ 90 ​的​十位数​都​是​以​ -ty ​当字​尾​

20~90 ​的​十位数​ ​基数​ ​词​ ​音标​ 20 twenty /ˈtwenti/ 30 thirty /ˈθɜːti/ 40 fourty /ˈfɔːti/ 50 fifty /ˈfɪfti/ 60 sixty /ˈsɪksti/ 70 seventy /ˈsevnti/ 80 eighty /ˈeɪti/ 90 ninety /ˈnaɪnti/

​对于​从​ 21~99 ​的​来说​，​可​使用​“​十位数​词​ + ​个位数​”​的​规则​。

​例子​

​基数​ ​词​ ​音标​ 21 twenty-one /ˈtwenti wʌn/ 32 twenty-two /ˈθɜːti tuː/ 43 forty-three /ˈfɔːti θriː/ 54 fifty-four /ˈˈfɪfti fɔː(r)/ 65 sixty-five /ˈsɪksti faɪv/ 76 seventy-six /ˈsevnti sɪks/ 87 eighty-seven /ˈeɪti ˈsevn/ 98 ninety-eight /ˈnaɪnti eɪt/ ​单词​

/əˈklɒk/ o'clock adv.​点钟​ ​用法​： ①：What time is it? / What's the time?（​现在​几点​了​？ | ​今何​時​ですか？） -- It's 3 o'clock.（​已经​三点​了​。 | 3​時​です。） -- It's 3.（​已经​三点​了​。 | 3​時​です。）[​口语​上​使用​会​忽略​掉​“o'clock”] ②：Is it 3 o'clock?（​现在​是​ 3 ​点​吗​？ | 3​時​ですか？） --> What time is it?（​现在​几点​了​？ | ​今何​時​ですか？）[​对​“3 o'clock”​提问​] /ʃɒp/ shop n.[C]​商店​ /ˈməʊmənt/ moment n.[C]​片刻​，​瞬间​ ​用法​：at the moment == now ​例子​：He's doing the homework at the moment[now].（​他​现在​正在​做​家庭作业​。 | ​彼​は​今宿題​をしています。）

​短语​

on foot ​徒步​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​造句​ ​例​：John/often play football/basketball now - John often plays football, but he's playing basketball now. ①：the boys/often swim in the sea in summer/in the river today - The boys often swim in the sea in summer, but they swimming in the river today. ②：Mary/often buy sugar/some honey at the moment - Mary often buys sugar, buy she's some honey at the moment. ③：my sister/watch television every evening/listen to her stereo this evening - Our sister watch television every evening, but she's listening tothe stereo this evening. ④：we/often walk along the banks of the river/in the park today - We often walk along the banks of the river, but we are walking in the park today. ⑤：Ken and Ann/often speak English/French now - Ken and Ann often speak English, but They're speaking French now. ⑥：I/often drink coffee/tea at the moment - I often drink coffee, but I'm drinking tea at the moment. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：Is your daughter reading at the moment?（sleep） - No, she isn't. She's sleeping. Does she usually sleep in the afternoon?（at night） - No, she doesn't. She usually sleeps at night. ①：Are the children playing in the garden this morning?（do their homework） - No, they aren't. They're doing their homework. Do they often do their homework in the morning?（in the afternoon） - No, they don't. They often homework in the afternoon. ②：Are you cooking now?（eat my lunch） - No, I'm not. I'm eat my lunch. Do you usually eat your lunch at this time every day?（early in the afternoon） - No, I don't. I'm usually eat my lunch early in the afternoon. ③：Is it raining now?（snow） - No, it isn't. It's snowing. Does it usually snow in February?（January） - No, it doesn't. It's snows in January. ​例​②：Is Mrs. Smith going to the shops this afternoon?（talk to her friends） - No, she isn't. She's talking to her friends. Does she usually see her friends in the afternoon?（read magazines at home） - No, she doesn't. She usually reads magazines at home in the afternoon. ①：Are you watching television now?（play games） - No, I'm not. I'm playing games. Do you often play games in the evening?（watch television） - No, I don't. I often watching television in the evening. ②：Is Helen working at the moment?（drink tea） - No, she isn't. She's drinking tea. Does she drink tea at this time every day?（drink coffee） - No, she doesn't. She usually drink coffee at this time every day. ③：Is Sam eating his breakfast now?（shave） - No, he isn't. He shaving. Does he usually shave at this time in the morning?（listen to the radio） - No, he doesn't. He usually listens to the radio at this time in the morning.

docs.title: 1. ​顺​读法​（past[​经过​]；half[​一半​]；a quarter[​四分之一​]）
用法​：​分钟​ past ​小时​（[​小时​] ​过​ [​分钟​]，​表达​过​多少​时间​）
docs.text:
​例​： ①：12:30 half past 12（12​小时​ ​过​ ​一半​，​即​ 12:30） ②：12:15 a quarter past 12（12​小时​ ​过​ ​四分之一​，​即​ 12:15）

*​需要​注意​的​是​，“ past ”​的​说法​仅​适用​于​“​分钟​ <= 30”​的​情况​。

docs.title: 2. ​倒​读法​（to[​差​]；half[​一半​]；a quarter[​四分之一​]）
docs.text: “to”​的​说法​适用​于​大于​三十分钟​以上​的​（​不​等于​第三​十分钟​）

docs.title: 用法​：​分钟​ to ​小时​（[​小时​] ​差​ [​分钟​]，​表示​还有​多少​时间​到​）
二​：​现在​进行​时​[do/does] ​和​ ​一般​现在​时​[be + v.ing]
docs.text:
​练习​

  1. shave ①：What does he usually do every today?（​他​每天​通常​做​什么​？ | ​彼​は​毎​日​よく​何​をしていますか?） ②：He usually shaves at 7 o'clock every today.（​他​通常​每天​七点钟​刮胡子​。 | ​彼​は​今日​はいつも7​時​に​髭​を​剃​ります。） ③：What's he doing today?（​他​今天​在​做​什么​？ | ​彼​は​今日​何​をしていますか?） ④：He's shaving at 7 o'clock today.（​他​今天​七点​刮胡子​。 | ​彼​は​今日​7​時​に​髭​を​剃​ります。）
  2. swim ①：What do they usually do in the afternoon?（​他们​通常​下午​做​什么​？ | ​彼​らは​午​後​によく​何​をしますか?） ②：They usually play in the garden in the afternoon.（​他们​通常​下午​在​花园里​玩耍​。 | ​彼​らはたいてい​午​後​に​庭​で​遊​びます。） ③：What are they doing this afternoon?（​他们​今天下午​在​做​什么​？ | ​今日​の​午​後​、​彼​らは​何​をしているのですか?） ④：They're swimming in the river this afternoon.（​今天下午​他们​在​河里​游泳​。 | ​彼​らは​今日​の​午​後​、​川​で​泳​いでいます。）
  3. read book / cook ①：What do you usually do in the evening?（​你​晚上​通常​做​什么​？ | ​夕方​はいつも​何​をしますか?） ②：I usually cook a meal in the evening.（​私​はたいてい​夜​に​食事​を​作​ります。） ③：What are you doing this evening?（​你​今晚​会​做​什么​？ | ​今​晩​何​をしますか？） ④：I'm reading a book this evening.（​今天​晚上​我​正在​看书​。 | ​今​晩​は​本​を​読​んでいます。）
​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：What are you doing now?（read a newspaper） - I'm reading a newspaper. Do you read a newspaper every day?（often） - No, I don't read a newspaper every day, but I often read a newspaper. ①：What are you doing now?（write a letter to my mother） - I'm writing a letter to my mother. Do you write home every week?（sometimes） - No, I don't write home every week, but I sometimes write home. ②：What's she doing now?（clean her shoes） - She's cleaning her shoes. Does she clean her shoes every day?（every week） - No, she doesn't clean her shoes every day, buy she cleans her shoes every week. ③：What's your sister doing now?（sweep the floor） - She's sweeping the floor. Does she often sweep the floor?（sometimes） - No, she doesn't often sweep the floor, but she sometimes sweeps it. ​例​②：What's the postman doing now?（deliver letters） - He's delivering letters. Does he often deliver letters at eight o'clock in the morining?（often at eight thirty） - No, he doesn't. He often delivers letters at eight thirty in the morning. ①：What's your husband doing now?（take our son to school） - He's taking our son to school. Does he take your son to school at this time every morning?（usually at seven） - No, he doesn't. He usually takes him to school at seven. ②：What are you doing now?（wait for a bus） - I'm waiting for a bus. Do you usually wait for a bus at eight o'clock?（usually at seven thirty） - No, I don't. I usually wait for a bus at seven thirty. ③：What are the children doing now?（do their homework） - They're doing their homework. Do they always do their homework in the afternoon?（usually in the evening） - No, they don't. They usually do their homework in tthe evening. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：six/our friends/come and see us What's the time? - It's six o'clock. Our friends usually come and see us at six. ①：two/we/go to work What's the time? - It's two o'clock. We usually go to work at two. ②：four/the children/come home from school What's the time? - It's four o'clock. The children usually com home from school at four. ③：eleven/I/go to the shops What's the time? - It's eleven o'clock. I usually go to the shops at eleven.

docs.title: 如何​询问​衣帽​的​尺码​？
docs.text:
What size（​多大​尺码​的​？）

​例​： What size is that suit?（​你​西装​多大​尺码​的​？ | ​君​のスーツはどのくらいですか？）

​单词​

/ˈenvələʊp/ envelope n.[C]​信封​ ​例子​： ①：I have a new envelope.（​我​有​一张​新​的​信封​。 | ​新​しい​封筒​があります。） ②：He has a new envelope.（​他​有​一张​新​的​信封​。 | ​彼​には​新​しい​封筒​があります。） ③：Does he have a new envelope?（​他​有​一张​新​信封​吗​？ | ​彼​には​新​しい​封筒​がありますか？） /ˈraɪtɪŋ peɪpə/ writing paper ​信纸​ ​例子​：She's writing on that writing paper.（​她​正在​写​这些​信纸​。 | ​彼女​はこれらの​手紙​を​書​いています。） /ˈʃɒp əsɪstənt/ shop assistant ​售货员​ /saɪz/ size n.[C/U]​尺寸​，​尺码​，​大小​ ​例子​： ①：I want a large size.（​我​想要​大​尺码​的​。 | ​大​きなサイズが​欲​しいです。） ②：Do you want a large size.（​你​想要​大​尺寸​吗​？ | ​大​きなサイズが​欲​しいですか。） ③：What size do you want?（​你​想要​什么​尺寸​？ | どんなサイズが​欲​しいですか？） /pæd/ pad n.[C]​信笺​簿​ /ɡluː/ glue n.[U]​胶水​ /tʃɔːk/ chalk n.[C/U]​粉笔​ /tʃeɪndʒ/ change n.[U]​零钱​，​找​给​的​钱​ /hæv/ have v.​有​，​持有​

​短语​

What size is that suit? ​你​西装​多大​尺码​的​？ Do you have? ​你​有​什么​？

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：Do you have a dog and a cat? - I have a dog, but I don't have a cat. ①：Do you have a pen and a pencil? - I have a pen, but I don't have a pencil. ②：Do you have an envelope and a pad of paper? - I have an envelope, but I don't have a pad of paper. ③：Do you have an apple and an orange? - I have an apple, but I don't have an orange. ​例​②：Do they have any tables and chairs? - They have some tables, but they don't have any chairs. ①：Do they have any boxes and baskets? - They have some boxes, but they don't have any baskets. ②：Do they have any cups and saucers? - They have some cups, but they don't have any saucers. ③：Do they have any peaches and pears? - They have some peaches, but they don't have any pears. ​二​：​仿照​例句​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：Do you have any bread and butter? - We have some bread, but we don't have any butter. ①：Do you have any milk and sugar? - We have some milk, but we don't have any sugar. ②：Do you have any soap and water? - We have some soap, but we don't have any water. ③：Do you have any beef and lamb? - We have some beef, but we don't have any lamb. ④：Do you have any whisky and wine? - We have some whisky, but we don't have any wine. ⑤：Do you have any cheese and beer? - We have some cheese, but we don't have any beer. ⑥：Do you have any jam and honey？ - We have some jam, but we don't have any honey. ​三​：​仿照​例句​简短​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：Do you have a bike? -- Yes, I do. ①：Do they have a car? -- Yes, they do. ②：Do we have any wine? -- Yes, we do. ③：Do you have any steak? -- Yes, I do. ​例​②：Do you have an aeroplane? -- No, I/we don't. ①：Do you have any eggs? -- No, I don't. ②：Do we have any time? -- No, we don't ③：Do you have a French friend? -- No, I don't.

docs.title: Lesson 6：What make is it?（​它​是​什么​牌子​的​？）
如何​询问​某​件物品​的​品牌​？
docs.text:
​一般​情况​下会​使用​到​“brand”​来​表示​“​品牌​”​的​意思​，​而​不怎么​会​去​使用​“make”。

​例句​

What brand is this? --They's the same.（​这是​哪个​牌子​的​来​着​？ --​都​是​同一个​牌子​。 | これはどこのブランドだけ？ --​同​じのですよ。）

​单词​

/meɪk/ make n.​品牌​ /brænd/ brand n.​商标​;​牌子​;​品牌​ /ˈswiː.dɪʃ/ Swedish adj.​瑞典​的​；​瑞典人​的​；​瑞典语​的​ ​补充​：Sweden（n.​瑞典​） ​补充​（chitchat）：I love Swedish meatball.（​我​中意​你们​那边​的​瑞典​肉丸​ | そこにあるスウェーデンのミートボールが​好​き） /ˈɪŋ.ɡlɪʃ/ English n.​英语​; ​英文​; adj.​英格兰​的​; ​英格兰​人​的​; ​补充​： ①：​大多数​情况​下​表示​“​英国​”​使用​“UK（​或者​ Britain）” ②：“​英国​”​的​全​名为​“​大不列颠​及​北爱尔兰​联合王国​”，​由​四个​部分​[​英格兰​（England）、​苏格兰​（Scotland）、​威尔士​（Wales）​和​北爱尔兰​（Northern Ireland）]​组合而成​ /əˈmer.ɪ.kən/ American adj.​美洲​的​、(​尤指​)​美国​的​; ​补充​： ①：America（n.​美国​人​; ​美洲​人​;） ②：US、USA /ɪˈtæliən/ Italian adj.​意大利​的​; ​意大利语​的​; ​意大利人​的​; n.​意大利人​; ​意大利语​ ​补充​：Italy（n.​意大利​）

​短语​

What brand is this? ​这是​什么​品牌​的​？

​语法​练习​

1.​仿照​例句​用​ he/she/it ​改写​下列​句子​ ​例​：That book is French. -- It's a French book.

①：That teather is English. -- He's/She's an English teacher. ②：That car is Swedish. -- It's a Swedish car. ③：Our teacher is good. -- He's/She's is a good teacher.

2.​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​问题​ ​例​： Is it a Swedish car or an American car?(American) -- It's an American car. Is Linda American or English?(American) -- She is American.

①：Is Hans a German student or a French student?(German) -- Hans is a German student. ②：Is Fiat a French car or an Italian car?(Italian) -- Fiat is an Italian car. ③：Is he French or Italian?(French) -- He is French. ④：Is Naoko Korean or Japanese?(Japanese) -- Naoko is Japanese.

docs.title: Lesson 60：What's the time?（​几点钟​？）
docs.text:
​练习​

①：Do you have ...? ②：I don't have ... 1. potatoes ①：Do you and Penny have any beans?（​你​和​佩妮​有​一些​豆子​吗​？ | ​君​とペニーは​豆​を​持​っていますか？） ②：We don't have any beans, but we have some potatoes.（​我们​没有​豆子​，​但​有​一些​土豆​。 | ​豆​はありませんが、ジャガイモならありますよ。） 2. beer ①：Do Penny and Tom have any wine?（​佩妮​和​汤姆​有​一些​红酒​吗​？ | ペニーとトムは​赤​ワインを​持​っていますか?） ②：They don't have any wine, but they have some beer.（​他们​没有​红酒​，​但​有​一些​啤酒​。 | ​赤​ワインはありませんが、ビールならありますよ。） 3. biscuits ①：Do you and Tom have any bread?（​你​和​汤姆​有​一些​面包​吗​? | ​君​とトムはパンを​持​っていますか？） ②：We don't have any bread, but we have some biscuits.（​我们​没有​面包​，​但是​我们​有​一些​饼干​。 | パンはありませんが、ビスケットならありますよ。） 4. steak ①：Do you have any chicken?（​你​有​一些​鸡肉​吗​? | ​鶏​肉​はあるか？） ②：I don't have any chicken, but I have some steak.（​我​没有​鸡肉​，​但​我​有​一些​牛排​。 | チキンはないけどステーキはあるよ。） 5. eggs ①：Do the children have any butter?（​孩子​们​有​一些​黄油​吗​？ | ​子供​たちはバターを​持​っていますか？） ②：They don't have any butter, but they have some eggs.（​他们​没有​黄油​，​但​有​一些​鸡蛋​。 | バターはありませんが、​卵​ならあります。） 6. peas ①：Do you and Tom have any beans?（​你​和​汤姆​有​一些​豆子​吗​？ | ​君​とトムは​豆​を​持​っていますか？） ②：We don't have any beans, but we have some peas.(​我们​没有​豆子​，​但​有​一些​豌豆​。 | ​豆​はありませんが、えんどう​豆​があります。)

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​提问​并​回答​问题​ ​例​①：chalk/a box of white chalk Do you have any chalk? - Yes, I do. I have a box of white chalk. ①：wine/a glass of red wine Do you have any wine? - Yes, I do. I have a glass of red wine. ②：whiskey/a bottle of Scotch whisky Do you have any whiskey? - Yes, I do. I have a bottle of Scotch whisky. ③：soap/two bars of soap Do you have any soap? - Yes, I do. I have two bars of soap. ​例​②：large pads of paper/small ones Do they have any large pads of paper? - No, they don't have any large ones, They only have small ones. ①：German cars/Japanese ones Do they have any German cars? - No, they don't have any German ones. They only have Japanese ones. ②：red apples/green ones Do they have any red apples? - No, they don't have any red ones. They only have green ones. ③：long spoons/short ones Do they have any long spoons? - No, they don't have any long ones. They only have short ones. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​编写​对话​ ​例​：eleven/cook lunch/potatoes What's the times? - It's eleven o'clock. I'm going to cook lunch. Do we have any potatoes? - Yes, we do. What else do you want? ①：four/wash some clothes/soap What's the times? - It's four o'clock. I'm going to wash some clothes. Do we have any soap? - Yes, we do. What else do you want? ②：seven/do my homework/blue ink What's the times? - It's seven o'clock. I'm going to do my homework. Do we have any blue ink? - Yes, we do. What else do you want? ③：eight/drink a glaass of beer/clean glasses What's the times? - It's eight o'clock. I'm going to drink a glaass of beer. Do we have any clean glasses? - Yes, we do. What else do you want?

docs.title: 一​：​如何​使用​“feel / smell”​等表​感官​的​词​？
docs.text:
1. feel（​感觉​）

​例子​

①：She feels great.（​她​感觉良好​。 | ​彼女​は​気​分​が​良​いです。） ②：She doesn't feel bad.（​她​不​感觉​到​不好​。 | ​彼女​は​気​分​が​悪​いわけではありません。） ③：Does she feel great?（​她​感觉良好​吗​？ | ​彼女​は​気​分​が​良​いですか?） ④：How does she feel?（​她​感觉​如何​？ | ​彼女​はどんな​気​分​ですか？）

  1. look（​看起来​）

​例子​

①：It sounds terrible.（​听​起来​很​糟糕​。 | ​聞​いてはまずいです。） ②：It doesn't sound good.（​听​起来​不太好​。 | ​聞​いてはよくないです。）

  1. smell（​闻​起来​）

​例子​

①：I smell bad.（​我闻​起来​不太好​。 | ​私​は​臭​いです。） ②：Do I smell bad?（​我闻​起来​不太好​吗​？ | ​私​は​臭​いですか？） ③：How do I smell?（​我闻​起来​怎么样​？ | ​私​はどのように​香​りますか？）

  1. taste（​品尝​起来​）

​例子​

①：It tastes terrible.（​尝​起来​很​糟糕​。 | ひどい​味​がします。） ②：It doesn't taste good.（​尝​起来​不太好​。 | おいしくないです。）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​表达​“​重感冒​”？
docs.text:
a bad cold.（​重感冒​）

have a bad cold.（​得​了​重感冒​。）

docs.title: 三​：​如何​表达​“​我​有​好消息​”？
docs.text: I have good news.（​我​有​好消息​。）

docs.title: 四​：​如何​表达​“​你​有​毛病​吗​？ / ​你​怎么回事​？”
docs.text:
What's the matter with you?（​你​有​毛病​吗​？ / ​你​怎么回事​？）

​以上​句子​在​语法​上​是​没错​的​，​但​它​其实​是​具有​一定​攻击性​的​语言​，​包含​了​谴责​、​愤怒​、​生气​的​情绪​。

​如果​我们​想​向​对方​表达​关心​或​询问​伤病​的​时候​，​通常​要​将​“with you”​的​部分​去掉​，​只​说​“What's the matter?（​你​怎么​了​？）”，​并且​要​用​升调​。

​单词​

/fiːl/ feel v.​感觉​ ​例​： ①：She feels great.（​她​感觉良好​。 | ​彼女​は​気​分​が​良​いです。） ②：She doesn't feel bad.（​她​不​感觉​到​不好​。 | ​彼女​は​気​分​が​悪​いわけではありません。） ③：Does she feel great?（​她​感觉良好​吗​？ | ​彼女​は​気​分​が​良​いですか?） ④：How does she feel?（​她​感觉​如何​？ | ​彼女​はどんな​気​分​ですか？） /bæd/ bad adj.​坏​的​，​严重​的​ /lʊk/ look v.​看​（​起来​） ​例子​： ①：He looks great.（​他​看起来​很​好​。 | ​彼​は​素晴​らしく​見​えます。） ②：Does he look great?（​他​看起来​很​好​吗​？ | ​彼​は​素晴​らしく​見​えますか？） ③：How does he look?（​他​看起来​怎么样​？ | ​彼​はどうですか？） /saʊnd/ sound v.​听​（​起来​） ​例子​： ①：It sounds terrible.（​听​起来​很​糟糕​。 | ​聞​いてはまずいです。） ②：It doesn't sound good.（​听​起来​不太好​。 | ​聞​いてはよくないです。） /smel/ smell v.​闻​（​起来​） ​例子​： ①：I smell bad.（​我闻​起来​不太好​。 | ​私​は​臭​いです。） ②：Do I smell bad?（​我闻​起来​不太好​吗​？ | ​私​は​臭​いですか？） ③：How do I smell?（​我闻​起来​怎么样​？ | ​私​はどのように​香​りますか？） /teɪst/ taste v.​尝​（​起来​） ​例子​： ①：It tastes terrible.（​尝​起来​很​糟糕​。 | ひどい​味​がします。） ②：It doesn't taste good.（​尝​起来​不太好​。 | おいしくないです。） /kɔːl/ call v.​叫​，​请​ ​例子​： ①：call me.（​打​我​[​电话​] | ​電話​して。） ②：give me a call.（​给​我​打个​[​电话​] | ​電話​してください。） /ˈdɒktə/ doctor n.[C]​医生​ ​例子​： ①：Do you know that doctor?（​你​认识​那位​医生​吗​？ | その​医者​を​知​っていますか？） ②：I don't have the doctor's number.（​我​没有​医生​的​电话号码​。 | ​医師​の​番号​がありません。） /ˈtelɪfəʊn [fəʊn]/ telephone [phone] n.[C/U]​电话​ ​例子​： ①：Where's the phone?（​电话​在​哪里​？ | ​電話​はどこですか？） ②：There's a phone in the living room.（​客厅​里​有​一部​电话​。 | リビングに​電話​があります。） /rɪˈmembə/ remember v.​记得​，​记住​ ​例子​： ①：Can you remember the doctor's phone number?（​你​能​记起​医生​的​电话号码​吗​？ | ​医者​の​電話​番号​を​覚​る?） ②：Sorry, I can't remember that.（​抱歉​，​我​记不起来​了​。 | ​思​い​出​せないでごめん。） /maʊθ/ mouth n.[C]​嘴​ /tʌŋ/ tongue n.[C]​舌头​ /kəʊld/ cold n.[C]​感冒​ ​例子​： ①：They have a bad cold.（​他们​得​了​重感冒​。 | ​彼​らはひどい​風邪​をひいた。） ②：Do they have a cold?（​他们​感冒​了​？ | ​彼​らは​風邪​を​引​いたのか？） ③：They don't have a cold.（​他们​没​得​感冒​。 | ​彼​らは​風邪​を​引​いていない。） /njuːz/ news n.[U]​新闻​，​消息​ ​例子​： ①：bad news（​坏消息​。 | ​悪​いニュース） ②：good news（​好消息​。 | いいニュース） ③：I have good news for me.（​我​告诉​你​好消息​。 | ​一​ついいニュースがあります。） ④：Do you have good news for me?（​你​有​好消息​要​告诉​我​吗​？ | いいニュースがありますか？）

​短语​

I have good news for you. ​我​有​好消息​要​告诉​你​。 have a bad cold. ​得​了​重感冒​。 What's the matter with you? ​你​有​毛病​吗​？ / ​你​怎么回事​？

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：Does he have a car?（small） - Yes, he does. He has a small car. ①：Does Dave have a glass?（clean） - Yes, he does. He has a clean glass. ②：Does she have a radio?（new） - Yes, she does. She has a new radio. ③：Does Helen have an orange?（big） - Yes, she does. She has an big orange. ​例​②：Does she have a pen?（pencil） No, she doesn't. She only has a pencil. ①：Does John have a blue tie?（red tie） - No, he doesn't. He only has a red tie. ②：Does Mike have a spoon?（fork） - No, he doesn't. He only has a fork. ③：Does he have a television?（radio） - No, he doesn't. He only has a radio. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​提问​并​回答​问题​ ​例​①：he/cups/plates Does he have any cups and plates? - He has some cups, but he doesn't have any plates. ①：Linda/pencils/pens Does Linda have any pencils and pens? - She has some pencils, but she doesn't have any pens. ②：George/books/pads of paper Does George have any books and pads of paper? - He has some books, but he doesn't have any pads of paper. ③：the man/newspapers/magazines Does the man have any newspapers and magazines? - He has some newspapers, but he doesn't have any magazines. ​例​②：our teacher/chalk/glue Does our teacher have any chalk and glue? - She has some chalk, but she doesn't have any glue. ①：he/paper/ink Does he have any paper and ink? - He has some paper, but he doesn't have any ink. ①：she/bread/jam Does she has any bread and jam? - She has some bread, but she doesn't have any jam. ①：Dave/tea/sugar Does he has any tea and sugar? - He has some tea, but he doesn't have any sugar. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​写出​下列​句子​的​对应​句​ ​例​：I have a bad handache.（take two aspirins） - You must take two aspirins. ①：She has measles.（stay at home） - She must stay at home. ②：she has toothache.（see a dentist） - She must see a dentist. ③：My sister has mumps.（you/take her to a doctor） - You must take her to a doctor. ④：I have a bad cold.（drink more water） - You must drink more water. ⑤：He has an earache.（see a doctor） - He must see a doctor. ⑥：I have a bad cough.（take some medicine） - You must take some medicine. ​四​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：Why is he late?（ill） - Because he's ill. ①：Why is she eating a big meal?（hungry） - Because she's hungry. ②：Why is she crying?（want an ice cream） - Because she's want an ice cream. ③：Why must she call the doctor?（have measles） - Because she's have measles.

docs.title: Lesson 62：What's the matter with them?（​他们​怎么​了​？）　　　　　   What must they do?（​他们​该​怎么办​？）
一​：​如何​表达​“​头疼​，​牙疼​”？
docs.text:
​无论是​“​头疼​（handache）”，​还是​“​牙疼​（toothache）”，​可以​看出​基本上​是​由​两个​单词​组合而成​的​。

​结构​：​身体​部位​（hand、tooth​等​） + ache（​疼痛​）

​这样​组合​出来​的​词​是​为​一个​名词​。

​如果​想要​放在​句子​中​表达​“​自己​/​他人​”​疼痛​的话​得​要​将​名词​动词化​（have/has）。

​例子​

I have a headache.（​我​头疼​。 | ​頭痛​がします。） He has a headache.（​他​头疼​。 | ​彼​は​頭痛​がします。）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​表达​“​看​医生​（​牙医​）”
docs.text:
I'm gonna see a doctor.（​我要​去​看​医生​。 | ​医者​に​診​てもらいます。）

I'm gonna see a dentist.（​我要​去​看​牙医​。 | ​私​は​歯​科​医​に​診​てもらいます。）

docs.title: 三​：​如何​表达​“​吃药​”？
docs.text:
take a medicine（​吃药​）

take some medicine（​吃​一些​药​）

​单词​

/ˈhedeɪk/ headache n.[C]​头疼​ ​例子​： I have a headache.（​我​头疼​。 | ​頭痛​がします。） He has a headache.（​他​头疼​。 | ​彼​は​頭痛​がします。） /ˈæsprɪn/ aspirin n.[C/U]​阿司匹林​ ​例子​： ①：take an aspirin.（​吃​一片​阿司匹林​。 | ​一​つのアスピリンを​取​ります。） ②：I have a headache, and I'm gonna take an aspirin.（​我​头疼​，​我要​吃​一片​阿司匹林​。 | ​私​は​頭痛​があり、アスピリンを​取​ります。） /ˈɪəreɪk/ earache n.[C/U]​耳疼​ ​例子​： ①：have an earache.（​耳朵​疼​。 | ​耳​が​痛​いです。） ②：Does he have a headache?（​他​是​头疼​吗​？ | ​彼​は​頭痛​がしますか？） -- No, he has an earache.（​不​，​他​是​耳朵​疼​。 | いいえ、​彼​は​耳​が​痛​いです。） /ˈtuːθeɪk/ toothache n.[C/U]​牙疼​ ​例子​： ①：Does she have a headache?（​她​是​头痛​吗​？ | ​彼女​は​頭痛​がしますか？） ②：No, she has a toothache.（​不​，​她​是​牙痛​。 | いいえ、​彼女​は​歯​痛​があります。） /ˈdentɪst/ dentist n.[C]​牙医​ ​例子​：I'm gonna see a dentist.（​我要​去​看​牙医​。 | ​私​は​歯​科​医​に​会​います。） /ˈstʌmək-eɪk/ stomach ache ​胃疼​ ​例子​： ①：He has a stomach ache.（​他​胃​疼​。 | ​彼​はお​腹​が​痛​いです。） ②：Does he have a stomach ache.（​他​是​胃痛​吗​？ | ​彼​はお​腹​が​痛​いですか？） /ˈmedsn/ medicine n.[C/U]​药物​，​药​ ​例子​： ①：What are you doing?（​你​在​干什么​？ | ​何​をしている？） ②：I'm taking some medicine.（​我​在​吃​一些​药​。 | ​私​はいくつかの​薬​を​飲​んでいます。） /ˈtemprətʃə/ temperature n.[C/U]​温度​，​体温​ ​例子​： ①：She has a temperature.（​她​发烧​了​。 | ​彼女​は​熱​があります。） ②：Does she have a temperature?（​她​发烧​了​吗​？ | ​彼女​は​熱​がありますか？） /fluː/ flu n.[U]​流行性​感冒​ ​例子​： ①：Does he have flu?（​他​得​了​流行性​感冒​吗​？ | ​彼​はインフルエンザにかかっていますか?） ②：No, he doesn't.（​不​，​他​没有​。 | いいえ、​彼​はインフルエンザではありません。） /ˈmiːzlz/ measles n.[U]​麻疹​ /mʌmps/ mumps n.[U]​胰腺炎​

​短语​

see a doctor（dentist）. ​看​医生​（​牙医​）。 have a headache(earache / toothache / stomach ache) ​头疼​（​耳疼​/​牙疼​/​胃疼​） take a(some) medicine ​吃​（​一些​）​药​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​造句​ ​例​：you/tell the truth/lies - You must always tell the truch. You mustn't tell lies. ①：I/be early for school/late - I must always be early for school. I mustn't be late. ②：we/drink clean water/drity water - We must always drink clean water. We mustn't drink dirty water. ③：she/drink milk/beer - She must always drink milk. She mustn't drink beer. ​二​：​仿照​例句​简短​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：Must a woman have new clothes?（yes） - Yes, she must. ①：Must I finish this homework before the lesson?（yes） - Yes, you must. ②：Must he do all the work today?（yes） - Yes, he must. ③：Must I type the letter now?（yes） - Yes, you must. ​例​②：Must she stay in bed?（no） - No, she mustn't. ①：Must they go to bed late?（no） - No, they mustn't. ②：Must we tell him the news?（no） - No, we mustn't. ③：Must he take an aspirin?（no） - No, he mustn't. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：What's the matter with Bob? He looks ill.（have a cold） - He has a cold. ①：What's the matter with you?（have a bad headache） - I have a bad headache. ②：What's the matter with our teacher?（feel ill） - He feels ill. ③：What's the matter with Susan?（have a bad toothache） - She has a bad toothache. ④：What's the matter with them?（have mumps） - They have mumps. ⑤：What's the matter with you?（have a stomachache） - I have a stomachache. ⑥：What's the matter with John?（have measles） - He has measles.

docs.title: 一​：​情态​动词​“must”
docs.text:
​对于​情态​动词​，​我们​在​第四十三章​当中​就​已​有所​耳闻​了​。

“must”​一​词表​“​必须​”​的​意思​。

“must”​在​句子​当中​的​变换​方式​与​第四十三章​当中​所学​到​的​另​一个​情态​动词​“can”​相似​。

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“must”​的​肯定句
docs.text:
​结构​：​主语​ + must + do[v.​动词​原型​]

​例子​

1. hungry I'm so hungry. I must eat some food.（​我​太​饿​了​。​我​必须​吃点​东西​。 | お​腹​が​空​いた。 ​食​べないといけない。） 2. thirsty I'm so thirsty. I must drink some water.（​我​很​口渴​。 ​我​必须​喝点​水​。 | ​喉​が​渇​いた。 ​水​を​飲​まないといけない。） 3. tired He's so tired. He must go to bed now.（​他太累​了​。 ​他​现在​必须​去​睡觉​了​。 | ​彼​はとても​疲​れていた，もう​寝​ないといけない。）

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“must”​的​否定句
docs.text:
​结构​：​主语​ + must + not + do[v.​动词​原型​]

*must not = mustn't

​需要​注意​的​是​：①：“mustn't”​意​为​“​禁止​、​不许​”，​而​并非​“​不​必须​”​之意​；②：​由于​其​通常​用来​表达​命令​等表​强烈​的​语气​，​因此​在​日常​对话​当中​勿​轻易​使用​。

​例子​

1. smoke You mustn't smoke here.（​你​不​可以​在​这里​抽烟​。 | ここでタバコを​吸​ってはいけません。） 2. stay You mustn't stay here.（​你​不能​在​这里​逗留​。 | ここにいてはいけません。）

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“must”​的​一般​疑问句
docs.text:
​结构​：Must + ​主语​ + do[v.​动词​原型​]?

*“must”​做​一般​疑问句​的​用法​在​现实​当中​并​不​常见​。

​例子​

①：Must he go?（​他​一定​要​去​吗​？ | ​彼​は​行​かなければいけない？） ②：Yes, he must.（​是​的​，​他​得​去​。 | はい、​行​かなければいけない。） ③：No, he mustn't.（​不​，​他​不能​去​。 | いいえ、いけません。）

docs.title: 语法​：​情态​动词​“can”​的​特殊​疑问句
docs.text:
​结构​：What + must + ​主语​ + do?

​例子​

①：What must she do?（​她​必须​做​什么​？ | ​彼女​は​何​をしなければなりませんか?） ②：She must clean her bedroom.（​她​必须​打扫​她​的​卧室​。 | ​彼女​は​寝室​を​掃除​しなければなりません。）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​表达​“​当然​了​ & ​没​问题​”？
docs.text:
certainly（/ˈsɜːtnli/，adv.​当然​、​可以​）

​单词​

/ˈbetə/ better adj.​较​好​的​，​更好​的​[well​的​adj​比较级​] /ˈsɜːtnli/ certainly adv.​当然​、​可以​ /ˈɡet-ʌp/ get up ​起床​ ​相似​：wake up（/weɪk-ʌp/，​醒来​） ​它们​之间​的​关系​是​：wake up at 6, but remain in bed, and get up at 8.（6​点​醒来​，​但​仍​躺​在​床上​，8​点​起床​。） /jet/ yet adv.​还​，​仍​ /rɪtʃ/ rich adj.​油腻​的​ ​例子​： ①：rich food（​油腻​的​食物​。 | ​油​っこい​食​べ​物​） ②：I don't like rich food.（​我​不​喜欢​油腻​的​食物​。 | ​脂​っこい​食​べ​物​は​好​きではありません。） /fuːd/ food n.[C/U]​食物​ /rɪˈmeɪn/ remain v.​保持​，​继续​ ​例子​： ①：He must remain in bed.（​他​必须​继续​躺​在​床上​。 | ​彼​はベッドにいたままでなければなりません。） ②：He mustn't get up yet.（​他​还​不能​起来​。 | ​彼​はまだ​起​きることがいけません。）

​短语​

certainly ​当然​了​/​没​问题​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​提问​ ​例​：park my car here - Can I park my car here? ①：use your pencil - Can I use your pencil? ②：sit here - Can I sit here? ③：borrow your bike - Can I borrow your bike? ④：come to your house - Can I come to your house? ⑤：stay in bed today - Can I stay in bed today? ⑥：look at your new dress - Can I look at your new dress? ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​①：How long must he stay in bed?（a week） - He must stay in bed for a week. ①：How long must I take the medicine?（three days） - You must take the medicine for three days. ②：How long must she work?（eight hours every day） - She must work for eight hours every day. ③：How long must you play the piano?（about an hour every day） - I must play the piano for about an hour every day. ​例​②：How long can I use your bike?（two weeks） - You can use my bike for two weeks. ①：How long can you live here?（about three months） - I can live here for about three months. ②：How long can students keep books from the library?（two months） - Students can keep books from the library for two months. ③：How long can Mary play in the garden?（about two hours） - She can play in the garden for about two hours. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：Why mustn't he open the window?（have a bad cold） - Because he has a bad cold. ①：Why mustn't she go to school today?（have measles） - Because she has measles. ②：Why mustn't I swim in the river?（have an earache） - Because I have an earache. ③：Why mustn't he eat an ice cream?（have an toothache） - Because he has an toothache.

docs.title: Lesson 64：Don't ...!（​不​可以​...!）　　　　　   You mustn't ...!（​你​不​应该​...!）
一​：​如何​表达​“​与​某人​玩​”？
docs.text:
play with sb.（​与​某人​玩​）

​例子​

①：Don't play with him.（​不要​和​那个​家伙​玩​。 | ​彼​と​遊​んではいけない。） ②：Can I play with him?（​我​可以​和​他​玩​吗​？ | ​彼​と​遊​んでもいいですか？）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​表达​“​同​某人​讲话​”？
docs.text:
talk to sb.（​同​某人​讲话​）

​例子​

①：Don't talk to me now.（​别跟我​讲话​。 | ​今私​に​話​しかけないでください。） ②：I'm gonna talk to him.（​我​去​跟​他​讲话​。 | ​彼​と​話​しかけする。）

docs.title: 三​：​如何​表达​“​探​出​窗外​”？
docs.text:
out of the window（​探​出​窗外​）

​例子​

①：Look, they are leaning out of the window.（​看​，​他们​正​把​身子​探​出​窗外​。 | ほら、​彼​らは​窓​から​身​を​乗​り​出​しています。） ②：Don't lean out of the window.（​不要​将​身子​探​出​窗外​。 | ​窓​から​身​を​乗​り​出​しないでください。）

docs.title: 四​：don't ​与​ mustn't ​相关​的​练习
docs.text:
1. take any aspirins ①：Don't take any aspirins!（​不要​吃​阿司匹林​。 | アスピリンを​服用​しないでください！） ②：You mustn't take any aspirins.（​您​不能​服用​阿司匹林​。 | アスピリンを​服用​してはいけません。）

  2. take this medicine ①：Don't take this medicine!（​不要​服用​这种​药物​！ | この​薬​を​服用​しないでください！） ②：You mustn't take this medicine.（​您​不能​服用​这种​药​。| この​薬​を​服用​してはいけません。）

  3. talk in the library ①：Don't talk in the library.（​不要​在​图书馆​里​说话​。 | ​図​書館​で​話​さないでください。） ②：You mustn't talk in the library.（​您​不能​在​图书馆​里​说话​。 | ​図​書館​で​話​してはいけません。）

​单词​

/pleɪ/ play v.​玩​，​玩耍​ ​例子​： ①：play with sb.（​与​某人​玩​ | sb.と​遊​ぶ） ②：Don't play with him.（​不要​和​那个​家伙​玩​。 | ​彼​と​遊​んではいけない。） ③：Can I play with him?（​我​可以​和​他​玩​吗​？ | ​彼​と​遊​んでもいいですか？） /mætʃ/ match n.[C]​火柴​ ​例子​： ①：play with matches.（​玩​火柴​、​玩火​ | マッチで​遊​ぶ。） ②：I can't find the matches.（​我​找​不到​火柴​。 | マッチが​見​つかりません。） ③：Can you find the matches?（​你​能​帮​我​找​火柴​吗​？ | マッチを​見​つけることができますか？） /tɔːk/ talk v.​谈话​ ​例子​： ①：talk to sb.（​同​某人​讲话​ | sb.と​話​す） ②：Don't talk to me now.（​别跟我​讲话​。 | ​今私​に​話​しかけないでください。） ③：I'm gonna talk to him.（​我​去​跟​他​讲话​。 | ​彼​と​話​しかけする。） /ˈlaɪbrəri/ library n.[C]​图书馆​ ​例子​： ①：go to the library.（​去​图书馆​ | ​図​書館​に​行​きます。） ②：He goes to the library.（​他​去​图书馆​。 | ​彼​は​図​書館​に​行​きます。） ③：Does he go to the library on Sundays.（​他​周日​去​图书馆​。 | ​彼​は​日曜日​に​図​書館​に​行​きますか？） /draɪv/ drive v.​开车​ ​例子​： ①：drive my car（​开​我​的​车​ | ​自​分​の​車​を​運​転​する） ②：Call me later, please. I'm driving.（​等​一会​再​打电话​给​我​好​吗​，​我​在​开着车​。 | ​後​で​電話​してください。 ​運​転​中​です。） ③：You can drive my car to school.（​你​可以​开​我​的​车​去​学校​。 | ​私​の​車​を​学校​に​運​転​することができますよ。） /səʊ/ so adv.​如此​地​ /ˈkwɪkli/ quickly adv.​快速​地​ ​例子​： ①：You are driving so quickly, please slow down.（​你​不要​开​得​那么​快​，​开慢​一点​。 | そんなに​速​く​運​転​しないで、ゆっくりと​運​転​してください。） ②：Don't drive so quickly.（​别开​那么​快​。 | そんなに​速​く​運​転​しないでください。） /liːn aʊt-ɒv/ lean out of ​身体​探​出​ ​例子​： ①：Look, they are leaning out of the window.（​看​，​他们​正​把​身子​探​出​窗外​。 | ほら、​彼​らは​窓​から​身​を​乗​り​出​しています。） ②：Don't lean out of the window.（​不要​将​身子​探​出​窗外​。 | ​窓​から​身​を​乗​り​出​しないでください。） /breɪk/ break v.​打破​ ​例子​： ①：break the window.（​把​窗户​打破​。 | ​窓​を​壊​します。） ②：Are you gonna break that window?（​你​要​打破​那扇​窗户​吗​？ | その​窓​を​壊​すつもりですか？） /nɔɪz/ noise n.[C/U]​喧闹声​，​噪声​ ​例子​： ①：make a noise.（​制造​声响​。 | ​騒​音​を​立​てる。） ②：Don't make a noise.（​不要​造​出​声响​。 | ​騒​音​を​立​てないでください。）

​短语​

play with sb. ​与​某人​玩​ play with matches ​玩​火柴​、​玩火​ talk to sb. ​对​某人​讲话​ talk with sb. ​与​某人​一起​交谈​ go to the library ​去​图书馆​ lean out of ​探​出​窗外​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​仿照​例句​改写​下列​句子​ ​例​：Don't put the glasses on the refrigerator. Put them on the table. - You mustn't put the glasses on the refrigerator. You must put them on the table. ①：Don't put the dishes here. Put them on the shelf. - You mustn't put the dishes here. You must put them on the shelf. ②：Don't go to school by bike today. Go to school by bus. - You mustn't go to school by bike today. You must go to school by bus. ③：Don't eat meat. Eat fresh fruit. - You mustn't eat meat. You must eat fresh fruit. ⑤：Don't look at your books. Look at the blackboard, please. - You mustn't look at your books. You must look at the blackboard. ⑤：Don't watch television. Do your homework. - You mustn't watch television. You must do your homework. ⑥：Don't talk in the library. Read your books. - You mustn't talk in the library. You must read your books. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​写出​下列​句子​的​对应​句​ ​例​：I don't feel well.（stay at home/today） - I don't feel well, so I'm staying at home today. ①：My son has a temperature.（must/take him to the doctor's） - My son has a temperature, so I must take him to the doctor's. ②：It's raining very hard.（I/go to work by taxi） - It's raining very hard, so I'm going to work by taxi. ③：I must catch the train.（taxi driver/drive quickly） - I must catch the train, so the taxi driver must drive quickly. ④：It's always warm in Greece in autumn.（tourists/often go there then） - It's always warm in Greece in autumn, so tourists must often go there then. ⑤：The lettuces are not fresh today.（I/not want them） - The lettuces are not fresh today, so I do not want them. ⑥：His car is in the garage today.（go to work by bus） - His car is in the garage today, so he's going to work by bus.

docs.title: 一​：​如何​表达​“​你​能​听见​我​说话​吗​”？
docs.text: Do you hear?（​你​能​听见​我​说话​吗​？）

docs.title: 二​：​如何​表达​“​玩得​开心​”？
docs.text:
enjoy yourself（​你​自己​玩得​开心​，​玩得​开心​）

​扩展​

①：enjoy ourselves（​我们​自己​玩得​开心​） ②：enjoy themselves（​他们​玩得​开心​）

​单词​

/dæd/ dad n.[C]​爸爸​ ​例子​： ①：My dad is driving now.（​我爸​现在​在​开车​。 | ​父​は​今​運​転​中​です。） ②：My mum is going to call my dad.（​我妈​要​跟​我​爸​打电话​。 | ​母​さんは​私​の​父​に​電話​します。） /kiː/ key n.[C]​钥匙​ ​例子​： ①：Can you find the key?（​你​能​找​得到​钥匙​吗​？ | ​鍵​を​探​すことができますか？） ②：She's going to give me the key.（​她​要​给​我​钥匙​。 | ​私​に​鍵​を​与​えようとしています。） /ˈbeɪbi/ baby n.[C]​婴儿​，​孩子​ ​例子​： ①：This is her baby.（​这​是​她​的​婴儿​。 | これは​彼女​の​赤​ちゃんです。） ②：Whose baby is this?（​这​是​谁​的​孩子​？ | これは​誰​の​赤​ちゃんですか？） /hɪə/ hear v.​听见​ ​例子​： ①：Can you hear me?（​你​能​听到​我​说话​吗​？ | ​私​の​声​を​聞​こえるかい？） ②：Do you hear that?（​你​听到​了​吗​？ | ​聞​こえますか？） /ɪnˈdʒɔɪ/ enjoy v.​玩得​开心​ /jɔːˈself/ yourself pron.​你​自己​ ​例子​：enjoy yourself（​玩得​开心​ | ​楽​しんでください。） /ɑːˈselvz/ ourselves pron.​我们​自己​ /mʌm/ mum n.[C]​妈妈​

​短语​

enjoy yourself ​玩得​开心​

​语法​练习​

​一​：​使用​反身代词​（myself、himself、herself、itself、yourself、yourselves、themselves、ourselves）​来​进行​填空​ ​例​：Jane and Jack are enjoying themselves at thee party. ①：Are you having a good time? - Yes I'm enjoying myself. ②：That knife is very sharp. Don't cut yourself! ③：Oh, look! He's going to cut himself! ④：The cat is washing itself in the garden. ⑤：Is mary enjoying herself? - Yes, she is. ⑥：What's he doing? - He's looking at himself in the mirror. ​二​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​造句​ ​例​：I/do my homework/seven thirty/evening I usually do my homework at seven thirty in the evening, but this evening I'm not going to. ①：Linda/get up/six/morning She usually get up at six in the morning, but this morning She isn't going to. ③：he/go to bed/ten/night He usually goes to bed at ten in the night, but this night(tonight) he isn't going to. ③：they/walk along the beach/six thirty/morning They usually walk along the beach at six thirty in the morning, but this morning they aren't going to. ​三​：​仿照​例句​用​所​给​的​词​回答​下列​问题​ ​例​：How old are you?（twelve） I'm twelve years old. What can you do at twelve?（sweep the floor） I can sweep the floor. ①：How old are you?（six） I'm six years old. What can you do at six?（go to school） I can go to school. ②：How old are you?（fifteen） I'm fifteen years old. What can you do at fifteen?（wash my clothes） I can wash my clothes. ③：How old are you?（seventeen） I'm seventeen years old. What can you do at seventeen?（type） I can type.

docs.title: 一​：​人称​代词​的​小​集合
docs.text:
​在​此​对​第二十一章​、​第二十三章​当中​的​表格​和​从​第六十五章​所学​到​的​“self”​进行​了​集合​。
